V03vinv171u:11_1: pratibhātu te maudgalyāyana śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kartum /
V03vinv171u:11_2: pṛṣṭhaṃ me āvilāyate / tat tāvad āyāmayiṣyāmīti / adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena /
V03vinv171u:11_3: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā gaṇapuṭāṃ saṃghāṭīṃ śirasy upanidhāya dakṣiṇapārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pāde pādam ādhāyālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānann utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvāṇaḥ /
V03vinv171u:11_5: yanv ahaṃ tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeyaṃ (SBV I 7) yathā samāhite citte śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam avalokayeyaṃ kuto nirjātāḥ śākyāḥ kimagraṇyāḥ kimanvayāḥ kaś ca śākyānāṃ paurāṇaḥ kulavaṃśa iti /
V03vinv171u:11_6: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam avalokayati /
V03vinv171u:11_7: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam avalokya yato nirjātāḥ śākyāḥ yadagraṇyāḥ yadanvayāḥ yaś ca śākyānāṃ paurāṇaḥ kulavaṃśaḥ /
V03vinv171u:11_8: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tasmāt samādher vyutthāya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
V03vinv171u:13_1: The beings in the region of the Ābhāsvara Devas

V03vinv171u:14_1: saṃvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā satvā ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadyante;

V03vinv171u:19_0: The appearance of the pṛthivīparpaṭake, etc.

V03vinv171u:20_9: durvarṇas tvam iti; teṣāṃ varṇābhimānikānāṃ satāṃ teṣām eva pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samādānahetoḥ pṛthivīparpaṭako 'ntarhitaḥ /

V03vinv171u:20_20: teṣāṃ yo 'lpataram āhāram āharati sa varṇavān bhavati;

V03vinv171u:20_67: athānyataraḥ satvas taṃ satvam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:20_68: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ satva śālikāraṇāt samavasarāma iti /
V03vinv171u:20_69: atha sa satvas tam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:20_70: pratijānīhi tvaṃ bhoḥ satva svaṃ śālim;
V03vinv171u:20_71: ānīto mayā sa dvaiyahnikaṃ traiyahnikaṃ yāvat sāptāhnikaṃ śālir iti /

V03vinv171u:33_49: deva vayam amātyā hitādhānatatparāḥ adūṣiṇo 'napakāriṇaḥ pravāsayāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:33_52: amātyāḥ saṃnipatya parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv171u:33_53: bhavanta upāyasaṃvidhānaṃ kartavyaṃ yena rājā kumāreṣu vimukhī bhavati;
V03vinv171u:33_54: tatas tair udyānaṃ śodhayitvā citram upacitraṃ kāritaṃ;
V03vinv171u:33_56: tatas tair amātyais tad udyānaṃ tathābhisaṃskṛtaṃ dūrād dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv171u:33_59: kumāraiḥ pṛṣṭāḥ kasyedam udyānam (SBV I 29) iti;
V03vinv171u:33_60: te kathayanti devasya; te pratinivartitum ārabdhāḥ; amātyāḥ kathayanti: kumārāḥ praviśata kimarthaṃ nivartatha iti;
V03vinv171u:33_62: kathaṃ praviśāma iti; amātyāḥ kathayanti: devo vā krīḍet kumāro vā ko 'tra virodhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:33_64: amātyai rājābhihitaḥ: deva udyānaṃ śobhanaṃ parikarmīkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv171u:33_65: kālo devasya draṣṭum iti; rājā saṃprasthitaḥ; aśrauṣīd udyāne kolāhalaṃ śabdaṃ;
V03vinv171u:33_67: śabdaḥ śrūyate; ko 'trāvatiṣṭhate; amātyāḥ kathayanti: deva kumārāḥ; yady evaṃ parityaktā mayā kumārāḥ;
V03vinv171u:33_69: deva kṣamyatāṃ kumārāṇāṃ; mā parityajyantām iti; rājā kathayati evaṃ bhavatv iti;
V03vinv171u:33_70: te pravāsayitum ārabdhāḥ rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:33_71: deva yady evaṃ yo 'smābhiḥ sārdhaṃ parijano gacchati sa yathā na nivāryate tathājñāṃ dātum arhasi;
V03vinv171u:33_72: rājñā ājñā dattā; te saṃprasthitāḥ; anuraktajanapadās te; taiḥ sārdhaṃ mahājanakāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:33_73: saptadivasaṃ potalakasya nagaradvāram apāvṛtaṃ sthitaṃ janakāyasya nirgacchataḥ;
V03vinv171u:33_74: amātyai rājñe niveditaṃ: deva yadi nagarasya dvāraṃ nāvriyate na cirāt potalakaṃ nirāvāsaṃ bhavatīti;
V03vinv171u:33_75: yady evaṃ dvārāṇy āvṛṇuta; tatas te kumārāḥ svakasvakā bhaginīr ādāyānupūrveṇa himavatpārśvaṃ nadyā bhagīrathyās tīraṃ kapilasya riṣer āśramapadasya nātidūram anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv171u:33_76: te tasmiṃś chākhāparṇakuṭīrakāṇi kṛtvā vāsaṃ kalpitavantaḥ mṛgāṃś ca praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayanti;
V03vinv171u:33_77: triṣkālaṃ ca kapilasya riṣer āśramapadam upasaṃkrāmanti;
V03vinv171u:33_78: abhinavayauvanamadākṣiptāḥ kāmarāgeṇātyarthaṃ bādhyamānāḥ utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍūkāḥ kṛśālakāḥ [A_359a] saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv171u:33_79: yāvad apareṇa samayena kapilena riṣiṇā tathāvidhā dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca:
V03vinv171u:33_82: sa kathayati: svakasvakā bhaginīs tyaktvā vaimātṛkābhir bhaginībhiḥ sārdhaṃ vāsaṃ kalpayata;
V03vinv171u:33_85: tatas te riṣivacanaṃ pramāṇam iti kṛtvā kāmarāgādhyavasitāḥ prītiprāmodyajātāḥ vaimātṛkābhir bhaginībhiḥ sārdhaṃ (SBV I 30) krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti;
V03vinv171u:33_86: teṣāṃ tābhiḥ saṃkrīḍatāṃ ramamāṇānāṃ paricārayatāṃ putrā duhitaraś ca jātāḥ;
V03vinv171u:35_0: The cities of Kapilavastu and Devadṛśa
V03vinv171u:36_1: sa kathayati: bhavantaḥ avalokitā bhavata; aham anyatra gamiṣyāmi; maharṣe kimarthaṃ; cittaikāgratāṃ nārāgayāmi, śabdakaṇṭakāni dhyānāni; maharṣe tvam ihaiva tiṣṭha; vayam anyatra gacchāmaḥ; kiṃ tu bhūbhāgam asmākam anuprayaccha;
V03vinv171u:36_2: bhavantaḥ śobhanaṃ; ṛṣayas te mahātmānaḥ īpsitamanorathasādhakāḥ;
V03vinv171u:36_3: tena sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṃgāram ādāya nagarākāreṇa udakadhārāpātair nagaraṃ māpitaṃ;
V03vinv171u:36_4: kapilena riṣiṇā teṣāṃ vāsāya vastu parityaktam iti kapilavastu kapilavastv iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:36_5: te tatra vṛddhiṃ gatāḥ; mahājanakāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ; saṃbādhād vṛddhiṃ na labhante;
V03vinv171u:36_6: teṣāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya devatābhir anyapradeśa upadarśitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:36_7: tais tatra gatvā dvitīyaṃ nagaraṃ māpitaṃ;
V03vinv171u:36_9: tatas te saṃgamya samāgamya saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv171u:36_10: bhavanto yad vayaṃ nirvāsitāḥ tat sadṛśabhāryopādānāt;
V03vinv171u:36_11: tad asmākaṃ na kenacid dvitīyā sadṛśī bhāryā upādātavyā;
V03vinv171u:36_13: te ekām eva sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ pariṇamayanti;
V03vinv171u:36_14: na dvitīyām; athāpareṇa samayena virūḍhako rājā priyān putrān samanusmaran amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:36_15: hambhoḥ grāmaṇyas te kumārāḥ kva sāṃprataṃ;
V03vinv171u:36_16: tair vistareṇārocitaṃ; deva kenacid adhikaraṇena nirvāsitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:36_17: te svakasvakā bhaginīr ādāya itaḥ prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:36_18: anuhimavatpārśve nadyā bhagīrathyās tīre kapilasya riṣer āśramapadasya nātidūre vāsaṃ kalayanti;
V03vinv171u:36_19: svakasvakā bhaginīḥ pratyākhyāya vaimātṛkābhir bhaginībhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti;
V03vinv171u:36_20: teṣāṃ krīḍatāṃ ramamāṇānāṃ paricārayatāṃ putrā (SBV I 31) duhitaraś ca jātāḥ;
V03vinv171u:36_22: deva śakyam; atha virūḍhakaḥ ikṣvākurājaḥ pūrvaṃ kāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhum abhiprasāryodānam udānayati;
V03vinv171u:36_23: śakyā bata kumārāḥ, paramaśakyā bata kumārā iti; maheśākhyena satvena vāṅ niścāritā śākyā bata kumārāḥ;
V03vinv171u:36_24: paramaśākyā bata kumārā iti śākyā iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā
V03vinv171u:39_2: so 'py aputraḥ kālagataḥ; ulkāmukho rājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_3: so 'py aputraḥ kālagataḥ; karakarṇī rājā saṃvṛttaḥ; so 'py aputraḥ kālagataḥ; hastiniyaṃso rājā saṃvṛttaḥ; so 'py aputraḥ kālagataḥ; nūpurako rājā samvṛttaḥ; tasya putra opurakaḥ; opurakasya gopurakaḥ gopurakasya gautamā rājñaḥ putraprapautṛkayā naptṛpranaptṛkayā kapilavastunagare paṃcapaṃcāśad rājasahasrāṇy abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:39_4: teṣām apścimako daśarathaḥ śataratho navatirathaḥ citraratho bijitaratho dṛḍharathaḥ daśadhanuḥ śatadhanuḥ navatidhanuḥ vijitadhanur citradhanuḥ dṛḍhadhanur;
V03vinv171u:39_5: dṛḍhadhanuṣo gautamā dvau putrau siṃhahanuḥ siṃhanādī ca;
V03vinv171u:39_6: yāvantaḥ khalu gautamā jambūdvīpe dhanurdharāḥ siṃhahanus teṣām agra akhyātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_7: siṃhahanor gautamā catvāraḥ putrāḥ śuddhodanaḥ śuklodanaḥ droṇodanaḥ amṛtodanaḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_8: śuddhā śuklā droṇā amṛtikā ceti duhitaraḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_9: śuddhodanasya dvau putrau bhagavān āyuṣmāṃś ca nandaḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_11: āyuṣmāṃś ca tiṣyo bhadrakaś ca śākyarājaḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_12: droṇodanasya dvau putrau mahānāmā āyuṣmāṃś cāniruddhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_13: amṛtodanasya dvau putrau āyuṣmān ānando devadattaś ca;
V03vinv171u:39_15: śuklāyāḥ putro mālī; droṇāyā bhāddālī; amṛtikāyāḥ śaivalaḥ bhagavato rāhulaḥ putra iti gautamā rāhule mahāsaṃmatavaṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:39_16: ucchinnā bhavanetrī vikṣīṇo jātisaṃsāro nāstīdānīṃ punarbhavaḥ
V03vinv171u:42_0: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā utthāya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:42_2: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana sādhu sādhu khalu tvaṃ maudgalyāyana yas tvaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ purastāc chākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavamśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayasi;
V03vinv171u:42_3: punar api tvaṃ maudgalyāyana abhīkṣṇam api tvaṃ śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathaya;
V03vinv171u:42_4: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;
V03vinv171u:42_6: udgṛhṇīta yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ dhārayituṃ grāhayituṃ vācayituṃ;
V03vinv171u:42_7: tat kasya hetoḥ; arthopasaṃhitā bhikṣavaḥ śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyā kathā;
V03vinv171u:42_9: yuktam eva bhikṣavaḥ śraddhayā pravrajitena kulaputreṇa śākyānāṃ (SBV I 33) paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ dhārayituṃ grāhayituṃ vācayitum;
V03vinv171u:42_10: atha kāpilavastavāḥ [A_360a] śākyā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ
V03vinv171u:45_0: tena khalu samayena kapilavastuni nagare siṃhahanur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:45_1: devadṛśe nagare suprabuddho rājyaṃ rājā kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:45_2: suprabuddhasya rājño lumbinī nāmāgramahiṣī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī;
V03vinv171u:45_3: devadṛśe 'nyatamo gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv171u:45_5: tasyābhirāmatayā rājā kālānukālaṃ tatra gatvā sārdham antaḥpureṇa ratikrīḍāṃ pratyanubhavati;
V03vinv171u:45_7: sa kathayati: deva mamaitam ārāmam anuprayaccheti;
V03vinv171u:45_8: rājā kathayati: gṛhapatisantako 'yam ārāmaḥ; katham anuprayacchāmi; yadi tvam ārāmeṇārthinī anyaṃ tavārthāya śobhanataraṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv171u:45_9: tato rājñā suprabuddhena lumbinyā arthāya tadviśiṣṭatara ārāmaḥ kāritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_10: tasya luṃbinīvanaṃ lumbinīvanam iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:45_12: aho bata me kule cakravartī utpadyeta iti;
V03vinv171u:45_14: aho bata me siṃhahanunā sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaḥ syād iti;
V03vinv171u:45_15: yāvat tasyāpareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:45_16: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv171u:45_17: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā;
V03vinv171u:45_18: (SBV I 34) tasyā rūpaśobhayā suprabuddho rājā sāntaḥpuro devadṛśanivāsī janakāyaś ca paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_19: sandigdhamanāś ca saṃvṛttaḥ: kim iyaṃ dārikā āhosvid viśvakarmanirmiteyaṃ māyeti;
V03vinv171u:45_20: tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātāyā jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
V03vinv171u:45_21: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti; amātyāḥ kathayanti: deva devadṛśanivāsijanakāyā rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vipravadante;
V03vinv171u:45_22: kecit kathayanti: dārikā evāsau pūrvakarmavipākābhiniṣpannā evaṃ varṇarūpaśobheti;
V03vinv171u:45_23: apare kathayanti: nāsau dārikā; kiṃtarhi viśvakarmanirmitā sā māyeti tasmād bhavatu dārikāyā māyeti nāma;
V03vinv171u:45_24: tasya māyeti nāma kṛtaṃ; māyā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradattā pūrvavad yāvan mahatī saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:45_25: sā naimittikair vyākṛtā; putraṃ janayiṣyaty anekalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ;
V03vinv171u:45_27: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato rammāṇasya paricārayataḥ duhitā [A_360b] jātā pratirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā;
V03vinv171u:45_28: tasyā janmani sarvaṃ tan nagaram udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ;
V03vinv171u:45_29: na cāsyāḥ śakyate sarvathā rūpaśobhāṃ varṇayituṃ;
V03vinv171u:45_30: yathā māyāyās tasyā api vistareṇa jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv171u:45_31: kiṃ bhavatu dārikā nāmeti; amātyāḥ kathayanti: asyā rūpaśobhā yan māyāṃ vyatiricya vartate tasmād bhavatu mahāmāyeti;
V03vinv171u:45_33: sā naimittikair vyākṛtā; putraṃ janayiṣyati dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv171u:45_36: dve duhitarau jāte māyā mahāmāyā ca;
V03vinv171u:45_39: dvitīyā vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣanaiḥ (SBV I 35) samalaṅkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv171u:45_44: kiṃ tu na dve sadṛśe bhārye ekasyopasthāpayitavye iti yaivaṃ vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaṃ sa rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartīti,
V03vinv171u:45_45: eṣā tāvat pratīṣṭā; dvitīyāyā arthāya gaṇam avalokayiṣyāmīti;
V03vinv171u:45_47: tena khalu samayena śākyānāṃ pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣāḥ prativiruddhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_48: śākyāḥ saṃbhūya rājñaḥ siṃhahanoḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_50: sāhāyyaṃ kalpayeti; sa kathayati bhavanto vṛddho 'haṃ na śaknomi taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayituṃ;
V03vinv171u:45_52: samayato 'nupreṣayāmi yadi kumārasya yathābhipretaṃ varaṃ prārthayato 'nuprayacchata;
V03vinv171u:45_53: te kathayanti: deva evaṃ bhavatu prayacchāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_54: rājñā caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ datvā śuddhodanaḥ kumāraḥ preṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_56: tataḥ śākyāḥ parituṣṭāḥ siṃhahano rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_57: deva kumāreṇa pāṇḍavā khaṣāḥ hataprahatāḥ vidhvastāḥ kṛtāḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_58: parituṣṭā smaḥ; vada kumārasya kaṃ varam anuprayacchāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_59: bhavantaḥ śākyaiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ na kenacid dve sadṛśe bhārye upasthāpayitavye iti;
V03vinv171u:45_61: sa kathayati: sutarāṃ baddhavyo na moktavyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:45_64: deva śobhanam; evaṃ kriyatāṃ; tataḥ siṃhahanunā suprabuddhasya lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ avalokito
V03vinv171u:45_67: śuddhodanena kumāreṇa dve api pariṇīte (SBV I 36)
V03vinv171u:47_0: Śuddhodana succeeds Siṃhahanu and the descent of the Buddha
V03vinv171u:48_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃhahanū rājā kālagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:48_1: kapilavastuni śuddhodano rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ [A_361a] ca;
V03vinv171u:48_2: so 'pareṇa samayena mahāmāyādevyā sārdham upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv171u:48_3: dharmatā hy eṣā tuṣitabhavanastho bodhisatvaḥ paṃcabhir avalokanair lokam avalokayati jātyavalokanena deśāvalokanena kālāvalokanena vaṃśāvalokanena stryavalokanena ca;
V03vinv171u:48_4: (1) kena kāraṇena bodhisatvā jātyavalokanaṃ kurvanti? tuṣitabhavanasthasya bodhisatvasyaivaṃ bhavati;
V03vinv171u:48_8: kadācit kṣatriyāḥ; idānīṃ tu kṣatriyāḥ uccakulasaṃmatāḥ,
V03vinv171u:48_10: mā me syur atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ bodhisatvena garhaṇīyāyāṃ jātau pratisandhir gṛhīta iti;
V03vinv171u:48_11: tathā hi bodhisatvenānādikālīnam anākṣepasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtam upacitam;
V03vinv171u:48_14: (2) kena kāraṇena bodhisatvā deśāvalokanaṃ kurvanti? bodhisatvasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:48_16: paśyati yo 'sau deśa ikṣuśālimālāgomahiṣīsaṃpanno bhaikṣukaśatakalilo dasyujanavivarjitaḥ āryajanādhyuṣitaḥ;

V03vinv171u:96_0: dharmatā khalu śākyamunir bodhisatvaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ kṛmivarmaṇo lipyācāryasya lipiṃ śikṣaṇāyopanyastaḥ;
V03vinv171u:96_1: kṛmivarmaṇā lipyācāryeṇa bodhisatvasya lipir likhitvā dattā;
V03vinv171u:96_2: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati jānāmy aham enām iti;
V03vinv171u:96_3: tatas tena dvitiyā tṛtīyā; evaṃ yāvat pañcalipiśatāni likhitvā dattāni;
V03vinv171u:96_4: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: etām apy ahaṃ jāne anyāṃ kathayeti;
V03vinv171u:96_5: kṛmivarmā kathayati: etāvatyo loke lipayaḥ pracaranti,
V03vinv171u:96_6: nāham anyāṃ jāne iti; tato bodhisatvena svayam eva lipir likhitvā kṛmivarmaṇo dattā;
V03vinv171u:96_7: uktaś ca kathaya kiṃnāmeyaṃ lipir iti;
V03vinv171u:96_8: sa kathayati na jānāmīti; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: dvayor loke pradurbhāvād iyaṃ lipiḥ prajñāyate,
V03vinv171u:96_11: evam etat kṛmivarman yathā bodhisatvaḥ kathayati;
V03vinv171u:96_12: dvayor eva loke prādurbhāvād iyaṃ lipiḥ prajñāyate,
V03vinv171u:96_16: brāhmī lipir brāhmī lipir iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:96_17: yadā bodhisatvo lipyāḥ pāraṃ gataḥ bhāddālināma bodhisatvasya mātulas tena hastigrīvāyaṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:96_20: bhāddālinā sahadeva ucyate: bodhisatvaḥ kāruṇikaḥ [A_367b] sarvāś śikṣāś śikṣayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:96_21: evam anye kumārāh; ayaṃ devadattaḥ krūrakarmā; asya marmavedho na vyapadeṣṭavyaḥ mā sarvalokaṃ vyāpādayiṣyatīti;

V03vinv171u:96_26: te saṃlakṣayanti; rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya putro naimittikair vyākṛtaḥ rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartīti;

V03vinv171u:96_44: tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ; sa pṛcchati; kuto 'yaṃ hastī? tair yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātam;

V03vinv171u:97_11: balaṃ ca paṃsayiṣyanti; tad upāyasaṃvidhānaṃ kartavyam iti;
V03vinv171u:97_12: tayā tādṛśaṃ vātam utsṛṣṭaṃ, yena sarve te vṛkṣāḥ karkarāyamāṇāḥ patitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:97_14: te vedhyaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ; teṣāṃ tatra lohā lakṣyāḥ; sapta lohamayās tālā bherī [sūrī] ca [pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ];

V03vinv171u:97_17: sapta tālā bherī sūrī ca bhinnāḥ;
V03vinv171u:97_19: nāgair uddḥṛtaḥ; pānīyaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ svādu; tan mahājanakāyaḥ pātum ārabdhaḥ;

V03vinv171u:101_5: rājñā śuddhodanena śrutaṃ kumāro naimittikair vyākṛta iti;
V03vinv171u:101_6: śrutvā punaḥ prītiprāmodyajataḥ śākyān sannipātya kathayati:
V03vinv171u:101_7: śrutaṃ me bhavantaḥ kumāro naimittikair vyākṛtaḥ yadi dvādaśabhir varṣair na pravrajiṣyati,

V03vinv171u:109_0: dharmatā khalu yadā buddhā bhagavanto loka utpadyante tadā sārakalyāṇī nāmā vṛkṣo jāyate;
V03vinv171u:109_2: yāvac cādityo nodayati tāvan nakhenāpi chidyate;
V03vinv171u:109_3: udite tv āditye śastreṇāpi na chidyate;
V03vinv171u:109_4: agnināpi na dahyate; antarā ca kapilavastu antarā ca devadṛṣam,
V03vinv171u:109_6: tasyāḥ kūle jātaḥ; kālena kālam udakavṛddhyā tasya mūlaṃ śocitam;
V03vinv171u:109_7: vātavaśāt patitaḥ setuvan nadīṃ ruddhvā sthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:109_8: tataḥ suprabuddhasya rājñaḥ anudakena deśo nāśyati;
V03vinv171u:109_9: śuddhodanasyāpy udakena; suprabuddhena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya sandiṣṭam:
V03vinv171u:109_10: sārakalyāṇi vṛkṣaḥ patitaḥ; rohakāṃ nadīm avaṣṭabhyāvasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:109_11: kumārā balavantaḥ śrūyante; tad etān preṣayitum arhasi iti;
V03vinv171u:109_12: rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati: nāhaṃ kumārāṇām ājñāṃ dadāmīti;
V03vinv171u:109_13: chandaḥ kathayati: kevalaṃ devo 'nujānātu; ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā na ca kumārāṇām ājñā dīyate,
V03vinv171u:109_14: atha ca punaḥ svayam eva gacchantīti;
V03vinv171u:109_16: chandena nadyā rohakāyās tīre pratyekaṃ kumārāṇām udyānāni māpitāni;
V03vinv171u:109_18: te kathayanti, gacchāmaḥ; te pratyekaṃ ratham abhiruhya udyānaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv171u:109_23: upahāraś ca dattaḥ; svastho jātaḥ; devadattena bodhisatvasya sandiṣṭam:
V03vinv171u:109_25: preṣayainam iti; bodhisatvena sandiṣṭam: yadaiva mayā bodhāya cittam utpāditaṃ,
V03vinv171u:109_27: tatra devadattasya bodhisatvena sārdhaṃ carame bhave tatprathamato vairūkṣyam utpannam;
V03vinv171u:109_28: anyabhaveṣu tu bahuśaḥ; suprabuddhena (SBV I 64) kumārā udyānabhūmiṃ sārakalyāṇīvṛksasyāpanayanāya nirgatā iti śrutvā mahājanakāyaḥ preṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:109_31: bhavantaḥ kim eṣa uccaśabdamahāśabdo mahājanakāyasya ca nirghoṣa iti;
V03vinv171u:109_36: udāyinā mā bodhisatvaṃ daṅkṣyatīti tīkṣṇena śastreṇa madhye chinnaḥ;
V03vinv171u:109_41: nandeneṣad utkṣiptaḥ; bodhisatvena tu sarvam upari vihāyasā kṣipto dvikhaṇḍo jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:109_42: nadyā rohakāyā ekasmiṃs tīre ekakhaṇḍo niparitaḥ,
V03vinv171u:109_43: dvitīye dvitīyaḥ; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: bhavantaḥ ayaṃ sārakalyāṇīvṛkṣaḥ śītavipākaḥ,
V03vinv171u:109_44: pittaghnaḥ; gaṇḍagaṇḍaṃ kṛtvā nayata; utpātagaṇḍapiṭakānāṃ pralepaṃ dāsyatha;

V03vinv171u:167_0: sa taṃ mārgaṃ nālam iti kṛtvā yenārāḍaḥ kālāmas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;

V03vinv171u:167_12: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharann acirād eva tān dharmān sākṣād akārṣīt;

V03vinv171u:167_17: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: mamāpy āyuṣman ārāḍa ime dharmāḥ svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtā yāvad evākiñcanyāyatanam iti;
