V03vinv171u:196_0: apīdānīm grāmakumārakā grāmakumārikāś cāgamyāsyobhayoḥ karṇasrotasos tūlikā āsārayanty api prasārayanty api;
V03vinv171u:196_5: loṣṭam api, śarkarām api; nābhijānāti bodhisatvas teṣāṃ grāmakumārakāṇāṃ grāmakumārikāṇāṃ vā antike praduṣṭaṃ cittam utpādayituṃ,
V03vinv171u:196_7: evaṃrūpāṇi bodhisatvasya duṣkarāṇi carataḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:196_8: ye kecid duḥkhaprahāṇayogam anuyuktā viharanti sarve te etāvan nāta uttareṇa;
V03vinv171u:196_9: ato bhūyas so 'pi mārgo nālaṃ jñānāya,
V03vinv171u:196_10: nālaṃ darśanāya, nālam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye iti;
V03vinv171u:196_15: tasyaitad abhavat: katamo 'sau mārgaḥ alaṃ jñānāya,
V03vinv171u:196_16: alaṃ darśanāya, alam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye iti;
V03vinv171u:196_17: tasyaitad abhavat: abhijānāmy ahaṃ pituḥ śuddhodanasya niveśane karmāntān anusaṅgamya jambūcchāyāyāṃ niṣadya [A_382a] viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ (SBV I 108) prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vihartum;
V03vinv171u:196_18: syāt sa mārgaḥ, syāt pratipad alaṃ jñānāya, alaṃ darśanāya, alam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhye;
V03vinv171u:196_19: sa tu mayā na sukaram utpādayituṃ yathāpitat kṛśena durbalenāplasthāmena;
V03vinv171u:196_20: yanv ahaṃ yathāsukham āśvasyāṃ yathāsukhaṃ praśvasyāṃ,
V03vinv171u:196_24: sa yathāsukham āśvasiti, yathāsukhaṃ praśvasiti; audārikam āhāram āharaty odanakulmāṣān;
V03vinv171u:199_0: atha teṣāṃ pañcānām upasthāyakānām etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:199_1: ayaṃ bhavantaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śaithilikaḥ saṃvṛtto,
V03vinv171u:199_2: bāhuliko bahulājīvaḥ, prahāṇavibhrānto ya eṣa idānīm audārikam āhāram āharaty odanakulmāṣān;
V03vinv171u:199_7: anupūrveṇa vārāṇasīṃ gatvā ye loke arhantas tān uddiśya pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:199_8: te pañca samagrāḥ sahitāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānā ṛṣivadane viharanti mṛgadāve iti pañcakāḥ pañcakā iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā
V03vinv171u:202_0: bodhisatvo 'py anupūrveṇa kāyasya sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca viryaṃ ca saṃjanayya anupūrveṇa senāyanīgrāmaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_1: tatra seno nāma grāmikaḥ; tasya dve duhitarau nandā ca nandabalā ca;
V03vinv171u:202_2: tābhyāṃ śrutam: śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'nuhimavatpārśve nadyā bhāgīrathyās tīre kapilasya ṛṣer āśramapadasya nātidūre:
V03vinv171u:202_3: sa brāhmaṇair naimittikair vipañcanakair vyāktṛaḥ rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī;
V03vinv171u:202_4: sa cābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ sarvajanamanoharaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_5: yā nārī dvādaśavarṣāṇi idam evaṃrūpaṃ vrataṃ samādāya vartate tasyā (SBV I 109) asau bhartā bhavati iti;
V03vinv171u:202_6: puruṣābhiprāyo mātṛgrāmaḥ; tābhyāṃ dvādaśavārṣikaṃ vrataṃ taptam;
V03vinv171u:202_7: tasya samāptau ṣoḍaśaguṇitaṃ madhupāyasaṃ tapaḥparikhinnāya ṛṣaye pratipādyate āgantukāya iti śrutvā ca punas tābhyāṃ gosahasraṃ dohayitvā tad eva gosahasraṃ pāyitam;
V03vinv171u:202_8: tatas tad eva gosahasraṃ dohayitvā pañcaśatāni pāyitāni;
V03vinv171u:202_9: tatas tāni pañcaśatāni dohayitvā tāny eva [pañcaśatāni] pāyitāni;
V03vinv171u:202_10: [tataḥ tāni] pañcaśatāni dohayitvā ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni pāyitāni;
V03vinv171u:202_11: tatas tāny ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni dohayitvā [tāny evārdhatṛtīyāni śatāni pāyitani;
V03vinv171u:202_12: tatas tāny ardhatṛtīyāni śātāni dohayitvā] pañcaviṃśatyuttaram śataṃ pāyitam;
V03vinv171u:202_13: tatas tat pañcaviṃṣatyuttaraṃ śataṃ dohayitvā [tad eva pañcaviṃśatyuttaraṃ śataṃ pāyitam;
V03vinv171u:202_14: tataḥ tat pañcaviṃśatyuttaraṃ śataṃ dohayitvā] triṣaṣṭiḥ pāyitā;
V03vinv171u:202_15: tatas tāṃ triṣaṣṭiṃ dohayitvā saiva triṣaṣṭiḥ pāyitā;
V03vinv171u:202_16: tatas tāṃ triṣaṣṭiṃ dohayitvā dvātriṃśat pāyitā;
V03vinv171u:202_17: tatas tā dvātriṃśat dohayitvā tā eva dvātriṃśat pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_18: tatas tā dvātriṃśat dohayitvā ṣoḍaśa pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_19: tatas tāḥ ṣoḍaśa dohayitvā tā eva ṣoḍaśa [A_383a] pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_20: tatas tāḥ ṣodaśa dohayitvā aṣṭau pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_21: tatas tā aṣṭau dohayitvā tā evāṣṭau pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_22: tatas tā aṣṭau dohayitvā sphaṭikamayyāṃ sthālyāṃ ṣoḍaśaguṇitaṃ madhupāyasaṃ sādhayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_24: bodhisatvaḥ idaṃ pāyasaṃ bhuktvā adyaivānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigamiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:202_25: tatas tejaupasaṃhāraḥ kartavya iti taiḥ sadyobalā oṣadhayaḥ prakṣiptāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_26: tatra ca kṣīre saṃparivartamāne cakrasvastikanandyāvartāni cihnāni dṛśyante;
V03vinv171u:202_27: tatra ca upago nāmājīvakaḥ paribhramaṃs taṃ pradeṣam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_28: tena tat pāyasaṃ dṛṣṭam; sa saṃlakṣayati: ya etat pāyasaṃ bhuṅkte so 'nuttaraṃ jñānam adhigamiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:202_30: sa muhūrtam ekānte prakramya sthito yāvad avatāritam iti;
V03vinv171u:202_31: sa upasaṅkramya kathayati: kṣuttarṣaśramapīḍito 'smi; mamaitat prayaccha iti; te kathayataḥ: nānuprayacchāma iti; sa tūṣṇīṃ prakrāntaḥ; tatas tābhyāṃ sphaṭikamayyāṃ sthālyāṃ ratnamayyāṃ pātryāṃ prakṣiptam;
V03vinv171u:202_33: tasyām avasthāyāṃ brāhmaṇaveṣam abhinirmāya tayoḥ purato 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_35: te śakrāya dātum ārabdhe; sa kathayati: kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo mamāntikād viśiṣṭataraḥ? yas tavāntikād viśiṣṭataraḥ tasyānuprayacchāvaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_37: tad asyānuprayacchatam; te tasmai dātum ārabdhe; (SBV I 110) sa kathayati: kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo mamāntikāt prativiśiṣṭatamaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_39: amī śuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ; ebhyo 'nuprayacchatam; te tebhyo dātum ārabdhe; te kathayanti: kiṃ asmākam anuprayacchatha āhosvid yo 'smadviśiṣṭatamaḥ? yo yuṣmadviśiṣṭatamaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_40: te kathayanti: ayaṃ bodhisatvo bhagavān nairañjanām abhyavagāhya gātrāṇi pariṣicya alpasthāmavatvān na śaknoti pratyuttartum;
V03vinv171u:202_41: eṣo 'smadviśiṣṭatamaḥ; asmāy anuprayacchatam; te tasya sakāśam saṃprasthite;
V03vinv171u:202_42: tadā devatābhir arjunaśākhāvanāmitā yām avalaṃbya bodhisatvo nadīṃ nairañjanām uttīrya cīvarakāṇi prāvṛtya nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_43: tatas tābhyāṃ satkṛtya tīvreṇāśayena tan madhupāyasaṃ tasmai pratipāditam;
V03vinv171u:202_45: pratigṛhya kathayati: kim eṣāpi pātrī parityaktā? te kathayataḥ:
V03vinv171u:202_46: bhagavann eṣāpi parityaktā; tato boshisatvena madhupāyasaṃ paribhujya sā pātrī prakṣālya nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ prakṣiptā;
V03vinv171u:202_47: nāgaiḥ pratigṛhītā; devānām adhastāj jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate;
V03vinv171u:202_48: śakreṇa devānām indreṇa garuḍaveṣam abhinirmāya nadīṃ nairañjanāṃ kṣobhayitvā,
V03vinv171u:202_49: nāgān vitrāsya, tāṃ pātrīm apahṛtya, deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu pātrīmahaḥ prajñaptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_52: te kathayataḥ: bhagavan yo 'sau śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'nuhimavatpārśve [A_383b] nadyā bhāgīrathyās tīre kapilasya ṛṣer āśramapadasya
V03vinv171u:202_53: nātidūre sa brāhmaṇair naimittikair vipañcanakair vyākṛtaḥ rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī iti;
V03vinv171u:202_54: so 'smākam anena kuṣalamūlena cittotpādenānnaparityāgena bhartā bhaved iti;
V03vinv171u:202_55: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: pravrajito 'sāv anarthikaḥ kāmair iti;
V03vinv171u:202_56: te kathayataḥ: bhagavan yady anarthī kāmaiḥ
V03vinv171u:202_61: evam astv ityuktvā bodhisatvaḥ madhupāyasaṃ paribhujya santarpitaḥ ṣaḍindriyabalasthāmaprāptaḥ,
V03vinv171u:202_62: (SBV I 111) nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre itaś cāmutaś ca niṣadya bhūmiṃ paryeṣate;
V03vinv171u:202_64: sa tam abhiruhya viviktāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe paryaṅkam ābhujya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_66: bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati: nūnaṃ mayāpakṣālāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāyaṃ parvato viśīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_67: devatā bodhisatvasya cetasā cittam ājñāya kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:202_68: bhagavan na tvayā pāpakāni karmāṇi kṛtāni;
V03vinv171u:202_69: api tu dharmatā hy eṣā, sarvāpi dvau pṛthivī na śaknoti dhārayituṃ yaś cocchinnakuśalamūlo yaś cottaptakuśalamūlaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_70: sa tvam uttaptakuśalamūlaḥ; naitad bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ sthānam;
V03vinv171u:202_71: api tu nadīṃ nairañjanām uttīryāmuṣmin pradeśe gaccha vajrāsanam;
V03vinv171u:202_72: tatra atītānāgatapratyutpannās sarve bodhisatvā niṣadyānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatavantaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_73: adhigamiṣyanti ca iti; tato bodhisatvo devatopadiṣṭena mārgeṇa saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_76: padminī prādurbhavati; caraṇanipāte saṃpīditā ceyaṃ mahāpṛthivī kāṃsapātrīva raṭitum ārabhdā;
V03vinv171u:202_78: vātabalāhakā api devaputrā mandamandaṃ pravātum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_79: varṣabalāhakā api devaputrā īṣat pravarṣitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:202_80: bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati: yādṛśīni me nimittāni prādurbhavanti adyaiva mayā anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigataṃ bhaviṣyatīti
V03vinv171u:205_0: nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ kālikasya nāgarājasya pūrvakarmavipākajaṃ bhavanam abhinirvṛttam;
V03vinv171u:205_2: sa raṇantyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ śabdena bhavanād abhyudgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:205_3: paśyati bodhisatvaṃ dūrād eva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam,
V03vinv171u:205_5: vyāmaprabhālaṅkṛtaṃ, sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ, jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ, (SBV I 112) samantatobhadrakam;
V03vinv171u:205_6: sahadarśanāc ca bodhisatvaṃ gāthābhir gītena cābhiṣṭotum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv171u:205_12: prahṛṣṭacittaḥ sumanā imāṃ giram uvāca ha //
V03vinv171u:205_13: pūrvakā hi mayā dṛṣṭās te 'pi buddhā mahardhikāḥ /
V03vinv171u:205_14: teṣāṃ tava ca paśyāmi na nānākaraṇaṃ mune //
V03vinv171u:205_15: yathokṣipasi pūrvaṃ hi pādaṃ dakṣiṇakaṃ mune /
V03vinv171u:206_1: raṇanty, adrākṣīt, buddhaś ca, pūrva, caraṇa, cīvara, sudṛḍha
V03vinv171u:206_2: cāṣa, anilāś caiva, tava, kṛtvātha te daśa /
V03vinv171u:209_0: tato bodhisatvaḥ kālikanāgarājena saṃstūyamāno vajrāsanābhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:209_2: tasya tṛṇaiḥ prayojanam iti śakro devānām indro bodhisatvasya cetasā cittam ājñaya gandhamādanāt parvatāt tūlasaṃsparśānāṃ tṛṃānāṃ bhāram ādāya svastikayāvasikavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya bodhisatvasya purastād avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:209_3: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: bhadramukha dīyantāṃ mamaitāni tṛṇānīti;
V03vinv171u:209_4: śakreṇa devendreṇa bodhisatvasya pādayor nipatya sagauraveṇa dattāni;
V03vinv171u:209_5: tato bodhisatvaḥ svastikasya yāvasikasyāntikāt tṛṇāny ādāya devatopadiṣṭena mārgeṇa yena bodhimūlaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:209_6: upasaṅkramya anākulam asaṅkulaṃ tṛṇasaṃstarakaṃ prajñapayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:209_7: tatas tāni tṛṇāni pradakṣiṇāni patitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:209_8: bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati: yathaitāni tṛṇāni pradakṣiṇaṃ patanti,
V03vinv171u:209_10: iti viditvā vajrāsanam abhiruhya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:209_11: ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtim upasthāpya cittam utpādayati;
V03vinv171u:209_12: na tāvad bhetsyāmi paryaṅkaṃ yāvad aprāpta āsravakṣayaḥ [A_384b]
V03vinv171u:209_13: sa na tāvat bhindati paryaṅkaṃ yāvad aprāpta āsravakṣayaḥ
V03vinv171u:212_0: mārasya pāpīyaso dvau dhvajau harṣasthānīyaḥ śokasthānīyaś ca;
V03vinv171u:212_1: yāvac chokasthānīyo dhvajaḥ kampitum (SBV I 114) ārabdhaḥ māraḥ pāpīyān saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:212_2: yathaiṣa kampate dhvajaḥ, nūnam anarthena bhavitavyam; sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ yāvat paśyati bodhisatvaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇam;
V03vinv171u:212_3: tasyaitad abhavat: ayaṃ śuddhodanaputro vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo yāvan madviṣayaṃ nākrāmati,
V03vinv171u:212_11: antaḥpuraṃ vidhvaṃsitam; śākyāḥ praghātitā iti; tatra bodhisatvasya trayaḥ pāpakā akuśalā vitarkāḥ samutpannāḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_12: tadyathā, kāmavitarko, vyāpādavitarko, vihiṃsāvitarkaś ca; tatra yaśodharāmṛgajāgopikāsu kāmavitarkaḥ,
V03vinv171u:212_14: bodhisatvasyaitad abhavat: kim arthaṃ me trayaḥ pāpakā akuśalā vitarkāḥ samutpannāḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_15: yāvat paśyati, māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṅkrānto yaduta vyākṣepakarmaṇeti;
V03vinv171u:212_17: bhūyo māraḥ kathayati: kim arthaṃ tvaṃ bodhimūle niṣaṇṇa iti;
V03vinv171u:212_19: māraḥ kathayati: kumāra kutas tava anuttaraṃ jñānam iti;
V03vinv171u:212_20: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati: tava tāvat pāpīyan ekaṃ yajñam iṣṭvā kāmadhātvīśvaratvaṃ saṃpannam;
V03vinv171u:212_21: prāg eva yena mayā triṣu kalpāsaṅkhyeyeṣv anekāni yajñakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇīṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:212_23: so 'ham anuttaraṃ jñānaṃ nādhigamiṣyāmīti kuta etat? evam ukto māraḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:212_24: sa tāvat bhavān eva sākṣī yathā mayā ekena yajñena kāmadhātvīśvaratvaṃ prāptam iti;
V03vinv171u:212_25: bhavataḥ kaḥ sākṣī; yathā tvayā triṣu kalpāsaṅkhyeyeṣv anekāni yajñakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇīṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:212_26: satvānāṃ cārthāya śiraḥkaracaraṇanayanamāṃsarudhirasutadārahiraṇyasuvarṇādi parityaktam anuttarajñānādhigamāyeti? tato bhagavatā cakrasvastikanandyāvartena jālāvanaddhena anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām (SBV I 115) āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa pṛthivī parāmṛṣṭā pṛthivī sākṣiṇī yathā mayā [A_385a] triṣu kalpāsaṅkhyeyeṣv anekāni yajñakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇiṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:212_28: tataḥ pṛthivīdevatā pṛthivīm udbhidya kṛtāñjalipuṭā śabdam udīrayati:
V03vinv171u:212_29: evam etat pāpīyan yathā bhagavān kathayatīti;
V03vinv171u:212_30: evam ukte māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tūṣṇīṃbhūto madgubhūtas srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparamo vyavasthitaḥ
V03vinv171u:212_32: evam apy ahaṃ kurvan na labhe śākyasya śuddhodanaputrasya avatāraṃ;
V03vinv171u:212_33: yanv aham asya bhūyasyās mātrayā vighnaṃ kuryām ityuktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_34: tatas tena tisro duhitaraḥ preṣitāḥ tṛṣṇā ca ratā ca ratiś ca;
V03vinv171u:212_35: tā rūpayauvanamadamattā divyavastrālaṅkāravibhūṣitā bodhisatvasya purastāt strīsādhyāni vidarśayitrm ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_36: tato bodhisatvenopāyakauśalena tathādhiṣṭhitā yathā vṛddhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_37: yena māras tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ; māras tās tathāvidhā dṛāṭvā viṣaṇṇaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
V03vinv171u:212_38: ko 'sāv upāyas syād yena śākyasya śuddhodanaputrasya tapovighnaṃ kuryām iti;
V03vinv171u:212_40: svayaṃ cākarṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā bodhisatvaṃ parivāryāvasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_41: tato bodhisatvas tān anekarūpān bahuvividhapraharaṇasahitān dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:212_42: yas tāvat prākṛtapuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃraṃbham ārabhate,
V03vinv171u:212_43: sa pratipakṣaṃ yojayati; prāg evāyaṃ kāmadhātvīśvaro yanv ahaṃ pratipakṣaṃ yojayeyam;
V03vinv171u:212_45: māraś ca ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭisahito bodhisatvasyopari kuntakacakratomarabhiṇḍipālaśarādi nikṣeptum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_47: tāni cāsya praharaṇāni divyāny utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi bhūtvā bodhisatvasya samantāt patitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:212_48: tato māra upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya pāṃsuvarṣaṃ varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_49: tad api (SBV I 116) divyāni māndārakāṇi puṣpāṇi bhūtvā bodhisatvasyopari nipatitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:212_50: tato māreṇa viṣavāyur utsṛṣṭaḥ upalavarṣaś ca;
V03vinv171u:212_51: śuddhāvāsakāyikābhir devatābhis tato bodhisatvasyopari parṇikākuṭir abhinirmitā;
V03vinv171u:212_52: upalavarṣeṇāpi viṣavāyusametena bodhisatvasya na kiñcit kṛtam iti;
V03vinv171u:212_53: māraḥ saṃlakṣayati: kiyac ciraṃ mayā parivārya avasthātavyam;
V03vinv171u:212_54: śabdakaṇtakāni dhyānāni; bodhivṛkṣaṃ sphaṭikamayam abhinirmāya gacchāmi;
V03vinv171u:212_57: iti viditvā bodhivṛkṣaṃ sphaṭikamayam abhinirmāya śrotrāvadhānatatparo 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:212_58: bodhipatrāṇi [A_385b] sphaṭikamayāni muhur muhuḥ svanitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:212_66: ayaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃś ciraṃ bodhisatvaṃ viheṭhayiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:212_67: iti viditvā tan mārabalaṃ cakravāṭasyopariṣṭāt kṣiptam iti
V03vinv171u:215_1: nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle yuktaḥ sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharati;
V03vinv171u:215_2: sa rātryā prathame yāme riddhiviṣayajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:215_4: eko bhūtvā bahūdhā bhavati; bahudhā bhūtvā eko bhavati; āvirbhāvatirobhāvaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pratyanubhavati;
V03vinv171u:215_5: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥ prākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati,
V03vinv171u:215_6: tadyathā ākāśe; pṛthivyām unmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti tadyathā udake;
V03vinv171u:215_7: udake abhinnasroto gacchati; tadyathā pṛthivyām, ākāśaṃ paryaṃkena krāmati tadyathā pakṣī śakuniḥ;
V03vinv171u:215_8: imaū vā punaḥ sūryācandramasau evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi;
V03vinv171u:215_9: yāvat, (SBV I 117) brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśe vartayati;
V03vinv171u:215_10: bhūyo māraḥ saṃlakṣayati: śabdakaṇṭakāni dhyānāni; yanv ahaṃ dūrastha eva śabdaṃ kuryām iti;
V03vinv171u:215_12: bodhisatvenāpi tadāvaranāya dvādaśayojanāni kadalīvanaṃ nirmitaṃ yenāsau śabdaḥ parāhataḥ śrūyate;
V03vinv171u:215_13: bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati: yanv ahaṃ divyaśrotrajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyaṃ cittam abhinirṇamayeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:215_14: yena yān śabdān ākāṅkṣāmi śrotuṃ tān śṛṇomi,
V03vinv171u:215_15: divyān api mānuṣān api; iti viditvā divyaśrotrajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:215_16: sa divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa ubhayān śabdān śṛṇoti mānuṣān apy amānuṣān api,
V03vinv171u:218_2: kena neti katham etaj jñāyate iti;
V03vinv171u:218_4: sa rātryā madhyame yāme cetaḥparyāyajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:218_7: sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:218_8: vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:218_10: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ, līnaṃ pragṛhītam, uddhatam anuddhatam, avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntam, asamāhitaṃ samāhitam, abhāvitaṃ bhāvitam, avimuktaṃ cittam, avimuktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:218_11: savimuktaṃ cittam [savimuktaṃ cittam] iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:218_12: tasyaitad abhavat: eṣāṃ mārakiṃkarāṇāṃ ko me anyasyāṃ jātau mātṛsaṃbandhaṃ pitṛsaṃbandhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:218_13: ko vā vadhakaḥ, pratyarthikaḥ, pratyamitra iti; katham etaj jñāyata iti; tasyaitad abhavat: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñayeti;
V03vinv171u:218_14: sa rātryā madhyame yāme pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:218_16: tadyathā ekām api jātiṃ, dve, tisraś, catasraḥ, pañca, ṣaṭ, sapta, aṣṭau, (SBV I 118) nava daśa, viṃśatiṃ, triṃśataṃ, catvāriṃśataṃ, pañcāśataṃ, jātisahasram api, jātiśatāny anekāny api, jātishasrāṇy anekāny api, jātiśatasahasrāṇi, saṃvartakalpam api, vivartakalpam api, saṃvartavivartakaplam api, anekān api saṃvartakalpān, anekān api vivartakalpān, anekān api saṃvartavivartakaplān samanusmarati;
V03vinv171u:218_17: amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvāḥ yatrāham āsam evaṃnāmā,
V03vinv171u:218_18: evaṃjātyaḥ, evaṃgotraḥ, evamāhāraḥ, evaṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedī,
V03vinv171u:218_19: evaṃdīrghāyuḥ, evaṃcirasthitikaḥ, evamāyuḥparyantaḥ; so 'haṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ;
V03vinv171u:218_22: tasyaitad abhavat: eṣāṃ mārakiṃkarāṇāṃ ke apāyagāminaḥ,
V03vinv171u:218_23: ke neti; katham etaj jñāyate? tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:218_25: sa rātryā madhyame yāme cyutyupapādajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:218_26: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa satvān paśyati,
V03vinv171u:218_28: suvarṇān api, durvarṇān api, hīnān api, praṇītān api, sugatim api gacchato, durgatim api gacchato; yathākarmopagān satvān yathābhūtān prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:218_29: amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ;
V03vinv171u:218_30: mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetoḥ taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣu prapadyante;
V03vinv171u:218_31: amī vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanassucaritena samanvāgatās āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ;
V03vinv171u:218_32: samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante;
V03vinv171u:218_33: tasyaitad abhavat: amī bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāmāśraveṇa bhavāśraveṇāvidyāśravena [A_386b] ca saṃsāre saṃsaranti;
V03vinv171u:218_35: yathā prahīyante tat kathaṃ jñāyata iti;
V03vinv171u:218_37: ca yuktaḥ sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharann āsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:218_38: sa idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:218_39: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhutaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:218_40: tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ (SBV I 119) paśyataḥ kāmāśravāc cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv171u:218_44: kṣīnā me jātir, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti;
V03vinv171u:221_0: yadā bodhisatvena ṣaṭtriṃśādbhūtakoṭiparivāraṃ māraṃ maitreṇāstreṇābhinirjitya anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigataṃ,
V03vinv171u:221_1: tadā mārasya pāpīyaso hastād dhanuḥ srasto,
V03vinv171u:221_2: dhvajaḥ patitaḥ, bhavanaṃ ca kampitam; tato māraḥ pāpīyān ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭiparivāro duḥkhī,
V03vinv171u:221_3: durmanā, vipratīsārī, tatraivāntarhitaḥ; mārakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ kapilavastunagare ārocitam:
V03vinv171u:221_4: śākyamunir bodhisatvo duṣkaracaryāṃ caritvā vajrāsanam abhiruhya tṛṇasaṃstare kālagataḥ iti;
V03vinv171u:221_5: yat śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ antaḥpurakumārāmātyagaṇasahīyo mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena santaptaḥ,
V03vinv171u:221_6: kapilavāstavaś ca janakāyaḥ; gopikā mṛgajā yaśodharā ca bodhisatvaguṇānusmaraṇāt mūrchitāḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:221_7: jalāvasekapratyāgataprāṇās tā antaḥpurajanena sāntvyamānā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā muhur bāṣparodhagadgadasvarā vipralapantyo 'vasthitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:221_8: tāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhābhiprasannābhir devatābhir ārocitam:
V03vinv171u:221_10: api tu tenānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam iti
V03vinv171u:224_0: yat śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ saparivāraḥ kapilavāstavaś ca janakāyaḥ paraṃ harṣam upāgatāḥ;
V03vinv171u:224_1: anuttarajñānādhigame ca bhagavataḥ yaśodharāyaḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:224_2: amṛtodanasya ca putro jātaḥ; rāhuṇā candro grastaḥ; atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv171u:224_4: candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpasphaṭikopanibaddham āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam ucchṛtadhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyam;
V03vinv171u:224_5: (SBV I 119) caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpitā madhye ca śṛṇgāṭakasya;
V03vinv171u:224_7: dakṣiṇe paścime uttare madhye śṛṅgāṭakasya [A_387a] dānāni dīyante;
V03vinv171u:224_8: puṇyāṇi kriyante; yaśodharāyāḥ putrasya nāma vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv171u:224_9: antaḥpurajanaḥ kathayati: asya janmani rāhuṇā candro grastaḥ;
V03vinv171u:224_10: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya rāhula iti nāmeti;
V03vinv171u:224_11: amṛtodanasyāpi tathaiva dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā putrasya nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv171u:224_13: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya janmani sarvaṃ nagaram ānanditaṃ,
V03vinv171u:224_14: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya ānanda iti nāmeti;
V03vinv171u:224_15: rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati: yo 'yaṃ yaśodharāyāḥ putro jātaḥ naiṣa śākyamuneḥ putraḥ;
V03vinv171u:224_17: tatas tayā bodhisatvasya vyāyāmaśilāyām āropya krīḍāpuṣkariṇyās tīre sthitayā satyopayācanaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv171u:224_18: yady ayaṃ bodhisatvena jātas tathāsyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ saha śilayā plaveta;
V03vinv171u:224_19: no cen nimajjeta; ityuktvā udake prakṣiptaḥ; sa tūlapicuvat saha śilayā plavitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:224_20: rājā śuddhodanas tad atyadbhutaṃ [śrutvā] mahājanakāyaparivṛto bodhisatvasya kriḍāpuṣkariṇīgato yāvat paśyati rāhulabhadraṃ bodhisatvasya śilāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ tūlapicuvad udake plavamānam;
V03vinv171u:224_21: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ sahasā puṣkariṇīm avatīrya rāhulabradraṃ kumāram aṃśenādāya vyutthitaḥ
V03vinv171u:224_22: yadā bhagavatā ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭiparivāraṃ māraṃ maitreṇāstreṇābhinirjitya anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam,
V03vinv171u:224_25: yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhās tamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvāv ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
V03vinv171u:224_26: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:224_27: tatra ye satvā upapannās [te svakam api bāhuṃ pragṛhītaṃ na paśyanti];
V03vinv171u:224_28: te tayā ābhayā (SBV I 121) anyonyaṃ satvān dṛṣṭvā saṃjānate;
V03vinv171u:224_29: anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ satvā upapannā anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ satvā upapannā iti;
V03vinv171u:225_1: śākyānāṃ caiva pravrajyā gaṅgāpāla namo 'stu te //
V03vinv171u:228_0: atha dvayor brahmakāyikayor devatayor [brahmaloke nivāsinor] etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:228_2: nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddhabodhis tejodhātusamāpannaḥ saptāham ekaparyaṅkena atināmayati;
V03vinv171u:228_4: yan nu vayam enaṃ gatvā pratyekapratyekaṃ gāthābhir abhiṣṭuyāma iti;
V03vinv171u:228_5: atha dve brahmakāyike devate tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv171u:228_6: prasāritaṃ vā saṃmiñjayet, evam eva dve brahmakāyike devate brahmaloke antarhite bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyaṣṭhātām;
V03vinv171u:228_17: ityuktvā tatraivāntarhite; atha bhagavāṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:228_18: yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac cāpi divijaṃ sukham /
V03vinv171u:228_20: nikṣipya hi guruṃ bhāraṃ nādadīta paraṃ punaḥ /
V03vinv171u:231_0: vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedī buddho bhagavān saptāham ekaparyaṅkena atināmayati;
V03vinv171u:231_2: tena khalu samayena trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijau pañcamātraiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyavaharamāṇau,
V03vinv171u:231_4: atha trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor anyatamāyāḥ purāṇamitrāmātyajñātisālohitāyāḥ devatāyāḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:231_5: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddho vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī saptāham ekaparyaṅkenātināmayati;
V03vinv171u:231_8: tat syāt trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;
V03vinv171u:231_9: yanv ahaṃ svayam evautsukyam āpadayeya yaduta bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātapradānasya hetor iti;
V03vinv171u:231_10: atha sā devatā sarvaṃ karvaṭakam udāreṇāvabhāsena sphāritvā trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijāv idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:231_11: vaṇijau vaṇijau ayaṃ buddho bhagavān uribilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddho vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī;
V03vinv171u:231_15: tad yuvayor bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;
V03vinv171u:231_17: (SBV I 123) atha trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:231_19: nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānam; yatredānīṃ devatā api tasya bhagavata autsukyam āpadyante yaduta piṇḍapātapratipādanahetoḥ;
V03vinv171u:231_20: iti viditvā prabhūtaṃ madhu ca manthāś ca ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntau;
V03vinv171u:231_21: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthātām;
V03vinv171u:231_23: ihāvābhyāṃ bhadanta bhagavantam uddiśya prabhūtaṃ madhu ca manthāś ca ānītāḥ;
V03vinv171u:231_24: tān bhagavān pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya iti;
V03vinv171u:231_25: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ pāṇau piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāṃ,
V03vinv171u:231_26: tadyathā anyatīrthikaḥ; yanv ahaṃ samanvāhareyam kutra pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:231_27: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti: pātre bhadanta pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:231_28: bhagavato 'pi samanvāhṛtya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate pātre pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:231_30: atha catvāro mahārājā bhagavataḥ pātreṇa pātrakāryam utpannam iti viditvā anyatamasmāt pāṣāṇaparvatāc catvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇy amanuṣyakṛtāny amanuṣyaniṣṭhitāny acchāni śucīni niṣpratigandhāny ādāya,
V03vinv171u:231_32: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte tasthuḥ;
V03vinv171u:231_33: ekāntasthitāś catvāro mahārājā bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv171u:231_34: iha asmābhir bhadanta bhagavataḥ pātreṇa pātrakāryam utpannaṃ viditvā anyatamamāt pāṣāṇaparvatāc catvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇy amanuṣyakṛtāny amanuṣyaniṣṭhitāni acchāni śucīni niṣpratigandhāni ānītāni;
V03vinv171u:231_35: tāni bhagavān pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya iti;
V03vinv171u:231_36: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: saced aham ekasya mahārājasyāntikād ekaṃ pātraṃ pratigrahīṣyāmi,
V03vinv171u:231_39: sacet trayāṇām ekasya bhaviṣyati cetaso (SBV I 124) 'nyathātvam;
V03vinv171u:231_40: yanv ahaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānām antikāc catvāri pātrāṇi pratigṛhya ekaṃ pātram adhimucyeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:231_41: atha bhagavāṃś caturṇāṃ mahārājānām antikāc catvāri patrāṇi pratigṛhya ekaṃ pātram adhimuktavān iti;
V03vinv171u:231_42: tatra bhagavatā trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor antikāt piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:231_43: tatra bhagavān trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijāv idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:231_44: etau yuvāṃ vaṇijau buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatām;
V03vinv171u:231_45: dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatām; yo 'py asau bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani saṅgho nāma tam api śaraṇaṃ gacchatām;
V03vinv171u:231_46: etāv āvāṃ bhadanta buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāvah,
V03vinv171u:231_47: dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāvaḥ, yo 'py asau bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani saṅgho nāma tam api śaraṇaṃ gacchāvaḥ;
V03vinv171u:231_48: atha bhagavāṃs trapuṣbhallikayor vaṇijos tad dānam anayā abhyanumodanayā abhyanumodate
V03vinv171u:231_50: sukhārthaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tat sukhāya bhaviṣyati //
V03vinv171u:231_51: sukho vipākaḥ puṇyānām abhiprāyaḥ ca siddhyati /
V03vinv171u:231_52: kṣipraṃ ca paramāṃ śāntiṃ nirvṛtiṃ cādhigacchati //
V03vinv171u:231_54: na śaknuvanty antarāyaṃ kṛtapuṇyasya kartu vai //
V03vinv171u:231_55: saced hi sa vyāyamate āryaprajñayā tyāgavān /
V03vinv171u:231_57: atha trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijau bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntau (SBV I 125)
V03vinv171u:233_0: The Buddha's ailment, and Māra's mischief again
V03vinv171u:234_0: atha bhagavān trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor antikāt piṇḍapātam ādāya yena nadī nairañjanā tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:234_1: upasaṅkramya nadyā nairañjanāyās tire niṣadya bhaktakṛtyam akārṣīt;
V03vinv171u:234_2: tatra madhv api vātikaṃ, manthā api vātikāḥ, tena bhagavato vātābādhikaṃ glānyam utpannam;
V03vinv171u:234_3: atha māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato vātābādhikaṃ glānyam utpannaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:234_6: parinirvātu bhagavān, parinirvāṇakālasamaya iti; atha bhagavata etad abhavat: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān upasaṅkrānto yaduta vyākṣepakarmaṇi;
V03vinv171u:234_7: iti viditvā māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:234_9: yāvan na me śrāvakāḥ paṇḍitā bhaviṣyanti vyaktā medhāvinaḥ,
V03vinv171u:234_10: alam utpannotpannānāṃ parapravādakānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahītāraḥ alaṃ svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāraḥ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakā upāsikāḥ,
V03vinv171u:234_11: vaistārikaṃ ca me brahmacaryaṃ bhaviṣyati bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtaṃ yāvad devamanuṣyebhaḥ samyaksuprakāśitam iti;
V03vinv171u:234_14: iti viditvā duḥkhī durmanā vipratīsārī tatraivāntarhitaḥ
V03vinv171u:237_0: atha śakro devendro bhagavato vātābādhikaṃ glānyam utpannaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:237_1: yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tasya nātidūre mahad dharītakīvanam,
V03vinv171u:237_2: tato varṇagandharasopetā harītakīr ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:237_3: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt:
V03vinv171u:237_4: ekāntasthitaḥ śakro devendro bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:237_5: iha mayā bhadanta bhagavato vātābādhikaṃ glānyam utpannaṃ viditvā yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tasya nātidūre mahad dharītakīvanaṃ tato mayā varṇagandharasopetā (SBV I 126) harītakya ānītāḥ;
V03vinv171u:237_6: tā bhagavān paribhuṅktām; bhagavatā paribhuktā vātaṃ cānulomayiṣyanti;
V03vinv171u:237_8: tā bhagavān paribhuktavān; bhagavatā paribhuktā vātaṃ cānulomitam;
V03vinv171u:237_10: tena bhagavataḥ kṣemaṇīyataraṃ cābhūd yāpanīyataraṃ ca
V03vinv171u:240_0: atha bhagavān yathāsukhaṃ ramyaṃ bodhimūle vihṛtya,
V03vinv171u:240_2: upasaṅkramya anyatarad vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya;
V03vinv171u:240_3: tena khalu samayena mucilindasya nāgarājasya bhavane sāptāhika akālameghaḥ samupāgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:240_4: atha mucilindo nāgarājaḥ sāptāhikam akālameghaṃ samupāgataṃ viditvā bhavanād abhyudgamya saptakṛtvaḥ kāye kāyaṃ veṣṭayitvā,
V03vinv171u:240_6: mā [A_389a] bhagavata imaṃ saptāhaṃ śītaṃ bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:240_7: mā uṣṇaṃ mā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśāḥ kāyaṃ paritāpayiṣyanti;
V03vinv171u:240_8: mucilindo nāgarājo taṃ vigataṃ sāptāhikaṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ kāyena kāyam udveṣṭya aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepano bhūtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:240_9: mā bhagavata imaṃ saptāhaṃ śītam abhūt,
V03vinv171u:240_10: mā uṣṇaṃ, mā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśāḥ kāyaṃ paritāpitavantaḥ;
V03vinv171u:240_11: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:240_15: asmimānasya yo vinaya etad vai paramaṃ sukham // (SBV I 127)
V03vinv171u:243_0: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ mucilindasya nāgarājasya bhavane vihṛtya,
V03vinv171u:243_3: paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya saptāham ekaparyaṅkenātināmayati,
V03vinv171u:243_4: idam evaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādam anulomapratilomaṃ vyavalokayan,
V03vinv171u:243_7: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam; vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam; nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam;
V03vinv171u:243_8: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ; sparśapratyayā vedanā; vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā; tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam; upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ; bhavapratyayā jātiḥ; jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā amī bhavanti;
V03vinv171u:243_9: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
V03vinv171u:243_10: yaduta asminn asati idaṃ na bhavati;
V03vinv171u:243_22: evam asya kevalasya mahataḥ duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati
V03vinv171u:243_23: atha bhagavāṃs tasyaiva saptāhasyātyayāt tasmāt samādher vyutthāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:243_52: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: adhigato me dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo duravabodhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:243_55: taṃ ca pare na vijānīyuḥ; sa mama syād vighātaḥ; syād bhramaḥ; cetaso 'nudaya eva; yanv aham ekākī araṇye pravaṇe dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyukto vihareyam iti;
V03vinv171u:243_57: na dharmadeśanāyām; atha brahmaṇaḥ sabhāpater etad abhavat;
V03vinv171u:243_58: vinaśyati batāyaṃ lokaḥ; praṇaśyati batāyaṃ lokaḥ, yatredānīṃ kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā (SBV I 129) loke utpadyante,
V03vinv171u:243_59: tadyathā udumbarapuṣpam; tasya cādya bhagavata alpotsukavihāratāyāṃ cittaṃ krāmati,
V03vinv171u:243_60: na dharmadeśanāyām; yanv aham enaṃ gatvā adhyeśayeyam;
V03vinv171u:243_61: atha brahmā sabhāpatis, tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv171u:243_62: prasāritaṃ vā saṃmiñjayet, evam eva brahmā sabhāpatir brahmaloke antarhitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:243_64: atha brahmā sabhāpatis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:243_70: kṛcchreṇa me adhigato 'khilo brahman pradālya vai /
V03vinv171u:246_2: madhyendriyā api, mṛdvindriyā api, svākārāḥ, suvineyā, alparajaso 'lparajaskajātīyā,
V03vinv171u:246_5: padmāni vā kumudāni vā, puṇḍarīkāṇi vā udake jātāny, udake vṛddhāny, ekatyāni udakād abhyudgatāni tiṣṭhanti;
V03vinv171u:246_7: evam eva santi bhadanta satvā loke jātā,
V03vinv171u:246_9: madhyendriyā api, mṛdvindriyā api, svākārāḥ, suvineyāḥ, alparajaso 'lparajaskajātīyā ye 'śravaṇāt saddharmasya parihīyante;
V03vinv171u:246_10: deśayatu bhagavān dharmam; deśayatu sugato dharmam; bhaviṣyanti dharmatatnasyājñātāraḥ;
V03vinv171u:246_11: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: yac cāham svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā (SBV I 130) lokaṃ vyavalokayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:246_12: atha bhagavān svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati;
V03vinv171u:246_13: adrākṣīd bhagavān svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan santi satvā loke jātā,
V03vinv171u:246_14: loke vṛddhās, tīkṣṇendriyā api, madhyendriyā api, mṛdvindriyā api, svākārāḥ, suvineyāḥ, alparajaso 'lparajaskajātīyā,
V03vinv171u:246_16: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya satveṣu mahākaruṇā 'vakrāntā;
V03vinv171u:246_17: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:246_25: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraivāntarhitaḥ
V03vinv171u:249_0: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: kasya nv ahaṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:249_1: atha bhagavata etad abhavat; yanv aham ārāḍasya kālāmasya tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:249_2: yo māṃ pūrvācārya eva san paramayā mānanayā mānitavān,
V03vinv171u:249_3: paramayā pūjanayā pūjitavān, parameṣu ca pratyayeṣv āttamanāś cābhūd abhirāddhaś ca;
V03vinv171u:249_4: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti: saptāhakālagato bhadantārāḍaḥ kālāma iti;
V03vinv171u:249_7: atha bhagavata etad abhavat; mahatī bateyaṃ jyānir, ārāḍasya kālāmasya kālakriyāyā;
V03vinv171u:249_8: sumahatī bateyaṃ jyānir ārāḍasya kālāmasya kālakriyāyā,
V03vinv171u:249_10: saced aśroṣyad ajñāsyat sa imaṃ dharmavinayam iti;
V03vinv171u:249_12: kasya nv chaṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti
V03vinv171u:252_0: atha bhagavata etad abhavat; yanv aham udrakasya rāmaputrasya tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:252_1: yo māṃ pūrvācārya eva san paramayā mānanayā mānitavān,
V03vinv171u:252_2: paramayā pūjanayā pūjitavān, parameṣu ca pratyayeṣv āttamanāś cābhūd,
V03vinv171u:252_3: abhirāddhaś ca; devatā bhagavata ārocayanti; abhidoṣakālagato bhadanta udrako rāmaputraḥ;
V03vinv171u:252_6: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: mahatī bateyaṃ jyānir udrakasya rāmaputrasya kālakriyāyā;
V03vinv171u:252_7: sumahatī bateyaṃ jyānir udrakasya rāmaputrasya kālakriyāyā,
V03vinv171u:252_9: saced imaṃ dharmavinayam aśroṣyad ajñāsyat sa imaṃ dharmavinayam iti
V03vinv171u:255_0: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: kasya nv ahaṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:255_1: tasyaitad abhavat: yanv ahaṃ pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:255_2: ye māṃ pūrvaṃ duḥkhaprahāṇayogam anuyuktaṃ viharantaṃ satkṛtyopatastuḥ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca;
V03vinv171u:255_3: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: kutra tv etarhi pañcakā bhikṣavo viharanti iti;
V03vinv171u:255_4: adrākṣīd bhagavān divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa pañcakān bhikṣūn;
V03vinv171u:255_6: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yathābhiramyaṃ bodhimūle vihṛtya yena vārāṇasī kāśīnāṃ nigamas tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv171u:258_0: tena khalu samayena upagur ājīvikas tasminn eva [A_390b] mārge adhvapratipanno 'bhūt;
V03vinv171u:258_1: adrākṣīd upagur ājīvako bhagavantaṃ pratipannaṃ (SBV I 132) mārge;
V03vinv171u:258_2: dṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha: viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautama indriyāṇi;
V03vinv171u:258_6: kasya vā dharmaṃ rocasīti; atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:258_7: na me 'sti kaścid ācāryaḥ sadṛśo me na vidyate /
V03vinv171u:258_8: eko 'smi loke saṃbuddhaḥ prāptaḥ saṃbodhim uttamām //
V03vinv171u:258_19: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā āśravakṣayam / –āsravakṣayam
V03vinv171u:258_20: jitā me pāpakā dharmās tenopagu jino hy aham //
V03vinv171u:258_24: na hi santaḥ prakāśante viditvā lokaparyāyam /
V03vinv171u:258_26: sādhv āyuṣman gautama jinaḥ; ityuktvā upagur ājīvakaḥ mārgād apakrāntaḥ (SBV I 133)
V03vinv171u:261_0: atha bhagavān kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:261_1: tena khalu samayena pañcakā bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ viharanti ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv171u:261_2: adrākṣuḥ pañcakā bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:261_4: kriyākāraṃ cākārṣuḥ; ayaṃ sa bhavantaḥ śramaṃo gautama āgacchati śaithiliko bāhuliko bahulājīvaḥ prahāṇavibhrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:261_5: sa etarhy audārikam āhāram āharati odanakulmāṣān;
V03vinv171u:261_9: na vanditavyo, na pratyutthātavyo, notthāyāsanenopanimantrayitavyo nānyatra prāg evāsanāni prajñapya;
V03vinv171u:261_10: idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ; saṃvidyante āyuṣman gautama āsanāni;
V03vinv171u:261_11: saced ākāṅkṣasi niṣīda iti; yathā yathā bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn darśanāyopasaṅkrāmati tathā tathā pañcakā bhikṣavo bhagavatas tejaś ca śriyaṃ ca gauravaṃ ca asahamānā utthāyāsanād eke bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñapayanti;
V03vinv171u:261_14: evaṃ cāhuḥ: etu bhavān gautama; svāgataṃ bhavate gautamāya; niṣīdatu bhavān gautama prajñapta evāsane;
V03vinv171u:261_15: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: cyutā bateme nohapuruṣā svasmāt kriyākārād;
V03vinv171u:261_16: iti viditvā prajñapta eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:261_17: tatrasvit pañcakā bhikṣavo bhagavantam atyarthaṃ nāmavādena gotravādena āyuṣmadvādena samudācaranti;
V03vinv171u:261_18: tatra bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:261_19: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavas tathāgatam [A_391a] atyarthaṃ nāmavādena gotravādena āyuṣmadvādena samudācarata;
V03vinv171u:261_21: tat kasya hetoḥ? yaḥ kaścid bhikṣavaḥ tathāgatam atyarthaṃ nāmavādena gotravādena āyuṣmadvādena samudācarati;
V03vinv171u:261_22: tat tasya bhavati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāya ahitāya duḥkhāya;
V03vinv171u:261_23: ta evam (SBV I 134) āhuḥ: tayā tāvat tvam āyuṣman gautama pūrvikayā īryayā caryayā duṣkaracaryayā kiñcid adhigatavān uttaraṃ manuṣyadharmād alaṃ āryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā,
V03vinv171u:261_24: darśanaṃ vā, sparśavihāratāṃ vā; kutaḥ punar yas tvam etarhi śaithiliko bahulājīvaḥ prahāṇavibhrāntaḥ sa tvam etarhy audārikaṃ āhāram āharasy odanakulmāṣān;
V03vinv171u:261_27: nanu yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paśyatha tathāgatasya pūrveṇāparaṃ mukhasya vā viprasannatvam,
V03vinv171u:263_1: tatra bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma :
V03vinv171u:263_2: dvāv imau bhikṣavo 'ntau pravrajitena na sevitavyau,
V03vinv171u:263_3: na vaktavyau, na paryupāsitavyau; katamau dvau; yaś ca kāmeṣu kāmasukhālayānuyogo hīno grāmyaḥ prākṛtaḥ pārthagjanikaḥ;
V03vinv171u:263_5: ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamya asti madhyamā pratipac cakṣuṣkaraṇī jñānakaraṇī upaśamasaṃvartanī abhijñāyaiva saṃbhodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv171u:263_7: tasya samyagdṛṣṭiḥ, samyaksaṅkalpaḥ, samyagvāk, samyakkarmāntaḥ, samyagājīvaḥ; samyagvyāyāmaḥ, samyaksmṛtiḥ, samyaksamādhiḥ; aśakad bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn anayā saṃjaptyā saṃjñapayitum;
V03vinv171u:263_8: dvau ca bhagavān pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrvabhakte avavadati;
V03vinv171u:263_11: trīṃś ca bhagavān pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paścādbhakte avavadati;
V03vinv171u:266_0: tatra bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:266_1: 1) idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi;
V03vinv171u:266_3: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ; iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipat āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir udapādi;
V03vinv171u:266_4: tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñeyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_6: tat khalu duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyam abhijñayā prahātavyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam [A_391b] ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_8: tat khalu duḥkhanirodham āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkartavyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_10: tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvayitavyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_12: tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñāyā parijñātaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_14: tat khalu duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyam abhijñayā prahīṇaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_16: tat khalu duḥkhanirodham āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_18: tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvitaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_20: yāvac ca (SBV I 136) mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ na cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_21: na jñānaṃ [na] vidyā na buddhir udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_22: na tāvad aham asmād bhikṣavaḥ sadevakāl lokāt,
V03vinv171u:266_23: samārakāt, sabrahmakāt, saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyā mukto nisṛto visaṃyukto vipramukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyāhārṣam;
V03vinv171u:266_24: na tāvad ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho 'smīty adhyajñāsiṣam;
V03vinv171u:266_25: yataś ca mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:266_27: tato 'ham asmāt sadevakāl lokāt samārakāt sabrahmakāt,
V03vinv171u:266_28: saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyā mukto nisṛto visaṃyukto vipramukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyāhārṣam;
V03vinv171u:269_0: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe āyuṣmata ājñātākauṇḍinyasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam,
V03vinv171u:269_1: aśīteś ca devatāsahasrāṇām; tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ kauṇḍinyam āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:269_2: ājñātas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ? ājñātaḥ bhagavann ājñātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:269_3: ājñātas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ? ājñātaḥ sugata ājñāta;
V03vinv171u:269_4: [ājñāto] āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena dharma iti tasmād āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya ājñātakauṇḍinya ity adhivacanam;
V03vinv171u:272_1: ghoṣam anuśrāvayanti: etan mārṣā bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam,
V03vinv171u:272_2: apravartyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā (SBV I 137) loke [sahadharmataḥ] bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām iti divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante,
V03vinv171u:272_4: bhaumānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā antarikṣāvacarā yakṣās [tam anuśrāvayanti] cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ;
V03vinv171u:272_5: tena kṣaṇena, teṇa lavena, tena muhūrtena, tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena [A_392a] yāvad brahmalokaṃ śabdo 'gamat;
V03vinv171u:272_7: ghoṣam anuśrāvayanti: etan mārṣā bhagavatā vārāṇasyaṃ ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam apravartyaṃ śramaṇena brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmataḥ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām iti divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante;
V03vinv171u:272_9: pravartitaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakram iti;
V03vinv171u:272_10: tasmād asya dharmaparyāyasya dharmacakrapravartanam ity adhivacanaṃ
V03vinv171u:274_0: The Budda explains the four Noble Truths
V03vinv171u:275_0: tatra bhagavān dvir api pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:275_5: jarā duḥkhaṃ, vyādhir duḥkhaṃ, maraṇaṃ duḥkham, priyaviprayogo duḥkham, apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkham, yad apīcchan paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tad api duḥkham;
V03vinv171u:275_8: 2) duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ katamat? tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī;
V03vinv171u:275_10: 3) duḥkhanirodham āryāsatyaṃ katamat? yad asyā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyāḥ nandīrāgasahagatāyās tatra tatrābhinandinyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho (SBV I 138) vyupaśamaḥ astaṅgamaḥ;
V03vinv171u:275_12: 4) duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyaṃ katamat? āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ;
V03vinv171u:275_13: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe āyuṣmata ājñātakauṇḍinyasyānupādāyāśravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam;
V03vinv171u:275_14: avaśiṣṭānāṃ tu pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam;
V03vinv171u:275_15: tena khalu samayena eko [loke] arhan bhagavāṃś ca dvitīyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:275_16: tatra bhagavān avaśiṣṭān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:275_17: rūpaṃ bhikṣavo nātmā; rūpaṃ ced bhikṣava ātmā syān na rūpam ābādhāya duḥkhāya saṃvarteta;
V03vinv171u:275_18: labhyeta ca rūpasyaivaṃ me rūpaṃ bhavatu,
V03vinv171u:275_19: evaṃ mā bhūd iti; yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo rūpam anātmā tasmād rūpam ābādhāya duḥkhāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv171u:275_20: na ca labhyate rūpasyaivaṃ me bhavatu,
V03vinv171u:275_21: evaṃ mā bhūd iti; vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñanaṃ bhikṣavo nātmā;
V03vinv171u:275_22: vijñānaṃ cet bhikṣavaḥ ātmā syān na vijñānam ābādhāya [duḥkhāya] saṃvarteta;
V03vinv171u:275_23: labhyeta ca vijñānasyaivaṃ me vijñānaṃ bhavatu,
V03vinv171u:275_24: evaṃ mā bhūd iti; yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ vijñānam anātmā,
V03vinv171u:275_26: na ca labhyate vijñānasyaivaṃ me vijñanaṃ bhavatu,
V03vinv171u:275_27: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo, rūpaṃ, nityaṃ vā [anityaṃ vā]? anityam idaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:275_28: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā duḥkham? duḥkham idaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:275_30: api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
V03vinv171u:275_31: eso 'ham asmy, eṣa me ātmeti? no bhadanta; kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā? anityam idaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:275_33: na vā duḥkham? duḥkham idaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:275_35: api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
V03vinv171u:275_36: eṣo 'ham asmy, eṣa me ātmeti? no bhadanta; (SBV I 139) tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo yat kiñcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam adhyātmaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yad vā dūre yad vā antike tat sarvaṃ naitan mama,
V03vinv171u:275_37: naiṣo 'ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmeti; evam etat yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam;
V03vinv171u:275_38: [evaṃ yā kācid vedanā yā kācit saṃjñā ye kecit saṃskārā yat kiṃcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yad vā dūre yad vāntike tat sarvaṃ naitan mama,
V03vinv171u:275_39: naiso 'ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmeti; evam etat yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam;
V03vinv171u:275_40: ] yataś ca bhikṣavaḥ śrutavān āryaśrāvaka imāṃ pañca upādānaskandhān naivātmato nātmīyataḥ samanupaśyati;
V03vinv171u:275_41: sa evaṃ samanupaśyan na kiñcil loka upādatte;
V03vinv171u:275_42: anupādadāno na paritasyati aparitasya ātmaiva parinirvāti;
V03vinv171u:275_43: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ; uṣitaṃ brahmacaryam; kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam; nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti;
V03vinv171u:275_44: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyaṃāṇe avaśiṣṭanāṃ pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām anupādāyāśravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni;
V03vinv171u:277_0: The conversin of Yaśas, son of Agrakulika
V03vinv171u:278_0: tatra bhagavān vārāṇasyāṃ viharati nadyā vārakāyaṣ tīre;
V03vinv171u:278_1: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ yaśā agrakulikaputraḥ prativasati;
V03vinv171u:278_2: divādivase strīmayena tūryeṇa krīḍitvā ramitvā paricārya śrāntakāyaḥ klāntakāyaḥ prābhārakāyaḥ pratiyaty eva middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_3: tā api striyaḥ śrāntakāyāḥ klāntakāyāḥ prāgbhārakāyāḥ pratiyaty eva middham avakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_4: adrākṣīd yaśā agrakulikasya putraḥ sarātram eva suptapratibuddhaḥ sarvās tā striyo vilālikā vinagnikā vikeśikā vikṣiptabhujāḥ kāny api kāny api vipralapantyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_5: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya sve 'ntaḥpure śmaśānasaṃjñā avakrāntā;
V03vinv171u:278_6: atha yaśā agrakulikaputro mahāśayanād avatīrya śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugaṃ prāvṛtya (SBV I 140) yenāntaḥpuradvāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_10: śabdaṃ cāntardhāpayanti; atha yaśā agrakulikaputro yena niveśanadvāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_14: śabdaṃ cāntardhāpayanti; atha yaśā agrakulikaputro yena nagaradvāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_18: śabdaṃ cāntardhāpayanti; atha yaśā agrakulikaputro yena nadī vārakā tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_19: tena khalu samayena bhagavān nadyā vārakāyās tīre bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe caṅkrame caṅkramyate yadbhūyasā yaśasam evāgrakulikaputram āgamayamānaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_20: adrākṣīt yaśā agrakulikaputro bhagavantaṃ nadyā vārakāyās tīre caṅkrame caṅkramyamāṇam dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:278_23: atha bhagavān yaśasam agrakulikaputram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:278_24: ehi kumāra; idaṃ te sthānam anupadrutam; idam anupasṛṣṭam iti; atha yaśā agrakulikaputraḥ śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugaṃ nadyā vārakāyās tīre ujjhitvā,
V03vinv171u:278_25: nadīṃ vārakāṃ pratyuttīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_26: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt;
V03vinv171u:278_27: atha bhagavān yaśasam agrakulikaputram ādāya yena svo vihāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:278_29: niṣadya bhagavān yaśasam agrakulikaputraṃ dharmayayā kathayā sandarśayati [samādāpayati] samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv171u:278_30: yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā tadyathā dānakathā,
V03vinv171u:278_31: śīlakathā, svargakathā, kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:278_32: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīd dhṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātuṃ,
V03vinv171u:278_33: tadā (SBV I 141) yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā,
V03vinv171u:278_34: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:278_35: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti;
V03vinv171u:278_36: evam eva yaśā agrakulikaputras tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:278_38: atha yaśā agrakulikaputro dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:278_39: abhikrānto 'haṃ bhadanta, abhikrāntaḥ; eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:278_40: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannaṃ
V03vinv171u:280_0: Yaśas's father becomes a lay-disciple and Yaśas an Arhat
V03vinv171u:281_0: adrākṣīd anyatamāvaruddhikā sarātram eva suptapratibuddhā yaśāḥ kumāro mahāśayane na dṛśyate iti;
V03vinv171u:281_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāgrakuliko gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrāntā;
V03vinv171u:281_3: yat khalv ārya jānīyā yaśāḥ kumāraḥ sve mahāśayane na dṛśyate [A_393b] iti;
V03vinv171u:281_5: māhaiva kumāraś corair vā dhūrtair vā svāpateyakāraṇāt bahir niṣkāsito bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:281_7: svayam eva pradīpikāhastaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ yena nadī vārakā tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:281_8: adrākṣīd agrakuliko gṛhapatir nadyā vārakāyās tīre śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugam ujjhitam;
V03vinv171u:281_10: māhaiva (SBV I 142) kumāraś corair vā dhūrtair vā niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:281_11: tathā hi nadyā vārakāyās tīre śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugam ujjhitam;
V03vinv171u:281_12: māhaiva kumāro 'nena tīrthena nadīṃ vārakām uttīrṇo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:281_13: tathā [hi] śatasāhasraṃ maṇipādukāyugaṃ nadyā vārakāyās tīre ujjhitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:281_14: iti viditvā tenaiva tīrthena nadīṃ vārakām uttīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:281_15: adrākṣīd bhagavān agrakulikaṃ gṛhapatim dūrād eva;
V03vinv171u:281_17: yanv ahaṃ tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskuryāṃ yathāgrakuliko gṛhapatir asminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ na paśyed iti;
V03vinv171u:281_18: atha bhagavān tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti yathāyrakuliko gṛhapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ na paśyati;
V03vinv171u:281_21: kaccit bhagavān yaśasaṃ kumāram [adrākṣīt]? tena hi gṛhapate niṣīda sthānam etad vidyate yad asminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ drakṣyasīti;
V03vinv171u:281_23: nūnaṃ ca bhagavatā yaśāḥ kumāro dṛṣṭo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:281_24: tathāhi bhagavān evam āha, tena hi gṛhapate niṣīda sthānam etad vidyate yad asminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ drakṣyasi;
V03vinv171u:281_25: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat;
V03vinv171u:281_26: ekānte niṣaṇṇam agrakulikaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmayayā kathayā sandarśayati,
V03vinv171u:281_28: yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv171u:281_29: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anusaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:281_30: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīd dhṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātuṃ,
V03vinv171u:281_31: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgaṃ catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:281_32: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakam rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ (SBV I 143) pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv171u:281_33: evam evāgrakuliko gṛhapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny [A_394a] abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:281_35: tasmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe agrakulikasya gṛhapater virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam;
V03vinv171u:281_37: atha bhagavāṃṣ tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:281_41: sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
V03vinv171u:281_42: tena khalu samayena ṣaṭ loke arhantaḥ,
V03vinv171u:281_43: bhagavāṃś ca saptamaḥ; adrākṣīd agrakuliko gṛhapatir yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇam;
V03vinv171u:281_44: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yaśasaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:281_45: ehi kumāra niveśanaṃ gamiṣyāvo mātā te śrāntakāyā klāntakāyā paridevitavatīti;
V03vinv171u:281_46: atha bhagavān agrakulikaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:281_47: kiṃ manyase gṛhapate yenāśaikṣeṇa jñānena aśaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:281_48: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ, samudayo, nirodho, mārgaḥ, api nu sa punar api gṛhī agāram adhyāvaseta? sannidhīkāraparibhogena vā kāmān paribhuñjīta iti? no bhadanta:
V03vinv171u:281_49: yathā khalu tvayā gṛhapate śaikṣeṇa jñānena śaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:281_50: duḥkhaṃ, samudayo, nirodho, mārgaḥ; evam eva kumāreṇa aśaikṣeṇa jñānena aśaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:281_51: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ, samudayo, nirodho, mārgaḥ iti; lābhā bhadanta yaśasā kumāreṇa sulabdhā yena aśaikṣenā jñānena aśaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:281_52: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ, samudayo, nirodho, mārgaḥ; sādhu bhagavān yaśasā kumāreṇa paścācchramaṇena yenāgrakulikas tenopasaṅkrāmed anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv171u:281_54: athāgrakuliko gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ (SBV I 144) viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv171u:283_0: Yaśa's mother and wife become lay-disciples
V03vinv171u:284_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya āyuṣmatā yaśasā paścācchrameṇena yenāgrakulikasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:284_1: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca madhyamāyāṃ dvāraśālāyām āsthātāṃ yadbhūyasā bhagavantam āgamayamāne;
V03vinv171u:284_2: adrāṣṭām āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca bhagavantam dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñāpayataḥ;
V03vinv171u:284_3: evaṃ cāhatuḥ; etu bhagavān; svāgataṃ bhagavate; niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta eva āsane;
V03vinv171u:284_5: athāyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇe;
V03vinv171u:284_6: ekānte niṣaṇṇām āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikāṃ purāṇadvitīyāṃ ca bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati,
V03vinv171u:284_7: [A_394b] samādāpayati, samuttejayati, saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv171u:284_8: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṅkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:284_9: yadā caite bhagavān adrākṣīd dhṛṣṭacitte kalyacitte muditacitte vinivaraṇacitte bhavye pratibale sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv171u:284_10: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā,
V03vinv171u:284_11: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni,
V03vinv171u:284_12: [vistareṇa] saṃprakāśayati; tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv171u:284_13: evam eva āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇe catvāry āryastyāny abhisamitavatyau;
V03vinv171u:284_15: atha āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca dṛṣṭadharme prāptadharme viditadharme paryavagāḍhaharme (SBV I 145) tīrṇakāṅkṣe tīrṇavicikitse aparapratyaye anayaneye śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpte utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocatām:
V03vinv171u:284_16: abhikrānte āvāṃ, bhadanta, abhikrānte; ete āvāṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāvo,
V03vinv171u:284_17: dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca; upāsike ca āvāṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopete śaraṇāgate abhiprasanne;
V03vinv171u:284_18: tena hi bhadanta ihaiva bhaktakṛtyaṃ kriyatām;
V03vinv171u:284_19: adhivāsayati bhagavān āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikāyāḥ purāṇadvitīyāyāś ca tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv171u:284_20: atha āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavantaṃ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ śucipraṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayataḥ,
V03vinv171u:284_21: saṃpravārayataḥ; anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇe dharmaśravaṇāya;
V03vinv171u:284_22: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikāṃ purāṇadvitīyāṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā sandarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:284_25: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti:
V03vinv171u:284_26: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā yaśasā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena antaḥpuramadhyagatasya svasminn antaḥpure śmaśānasaṃjñā utpannā;
V03vinv171u:284_27: sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitena ca bhagavato 'ntike arhatvaṃ ca sākṣātkṛtam;
V03vinv171u:284_28: yaśasā evaṃ bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni;
V03vinv171u:284_30: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv171u:284_31: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tu upātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante,
V03vinv171u:284_32: na pranaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv171u:284_33: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālam ca phalanti khalu dehinām // (SBV I 146)
V03vinv171u:287_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nātidūre riṣiḥ prativasati sma maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatvahitavatsalaḥ;
V03vinv171u:287_3: piṇdapātaṃ caritvābhyāgataḥ; yāvat paśyati taṃ mṛtakuṇapaṃ vilīnībhūtaṃ vyādhmātakaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:287_4: tasyaivāgrataḥ sphuṭitam; tena tatraiva vairāgyam utpāditam;
V03vinv171u:287_6: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau riṣir eṣa evāsau yaśāḥ kumāraḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv171u:287_7: yad anena tatra vairāgyam utpāditam tenaitarhi antaḥpuramadhyagatasya pratyayo dattaḥ;
V03vinv171u:287_8: iti hi bhikṣavasḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ;
V03vinv171u:287_10: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇi apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:289_0: Yaśas's four brothers are converted and become Arhats
V03vinv171u:290_0: aśrauṣur vārāṇasyāṃ dvitīya agrakulokaputras tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ pañcama agrakulikaputraḥ,
V03vinv171u:290_1: pūrṇo, vimalo, gavāṃpatiḥ subāhuś ca: yaśā agrakulikaputraḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajita iti;
V03vinv171u:290_2: śrutvā ca punar eṣām etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:290_4: nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānam; yatredānīṃ yaśā agrakulikaputras tāvat taruṇaḥ tāvat sukhaiṣī keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:290_5: yannu (SBV I 147) vayam api keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajemeti;
V03vinv171u:290_6: atha dvitīyo 'grakulikaputras tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ pañcamo 'grakulikaputraḥ pūrṇo,
V03vinv171u:290_7: vimalo, gavāṃpatis, subāhur, vārāṇasyāṃ niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:290_8: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte tasthuḥ;
V03vinv171u:290_9: ekāntasthitā dvitīyo 'grakulikaputras tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ pañcamaḥ agrakulikaputraḥ pūrṇo,
V03vinv171u:290_10: vimalo, gavāṃpatis, subāhur, bhagavantam idam avocan: labhemahi vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:290_12: labdhavantas ta āyuṣmantaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:290_13: evaṃ pravrajitā ekākino vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinaḥ prahitātmāno vyahārṣuḥ;
V03vinv171u:290_14: ekākino vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinaḥ prahitātmāno viharanto yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva [A_395b] śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānam dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayante:
V03vinv171u:290_15: kṣīnā no jātir, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānīma iti ājñātavanta āyuṣmanto 'rhanto babhūvuḥ suvimuktacittāḥ;
V03vinv171u:292_0: The conversion of fifty young men
V03vinv171u:293_1: prathamo 'grakulikaputro, dvitīyas, tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ, pañcamo 'grakulikaputro, yaśāḥ, pūrṇo, vimalo, gavāṃpatiḥ, subāhuḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitā iti;
V03vinv171u:293_2: śrutvā ca punar eṣām etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:293_5: dvitīyo yāvat purṇo vimalo gavāṃpatiḥ subāhur tāvat taruṇās tāvat sukhaiṣiṇaḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ (SBV I 148) pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:293_6: yannu vayam api keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣayāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajemeti;
V03vinv171u:293_7: atha pañcāśad utsadotsadā grāmikadārakā vārāṇasyāṃ niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:293_8: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte tasthuḥ;
V03vinv171u:293_9: ekāntasthitāḥ pañcāśad utsadotsadā grāmikadārakā bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv171u:293_10: labhemahi vayaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:293_12: labdhavantas ta āyuṣmantas svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:293_13: evaṃpravrajitās te āyuṣmanta ekakino vyapakṛṣṭāḥ apramattā ātāpinaḥ prahitātmāno vyahārṣuḥ;
V03vinv171u:293_14: ekākino vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinaḥ prahitātmano viharanto yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣayāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayante;
V03vinv171u:293_15: kṣīṇā no jātir, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānīma iti ājñātavanta āyuṣmanto 'rhanto babhūvuḥ suvimuktacittāḥ;
V03vinv171u:293_16: tena khalu samayena ṣaṣṭir loke arhanto bhagavān ekaṣaṣṭitamaḥ iti
V03vinv171u:295_0: The Buddha goes to the village Urubilvā
V03vinv171u:296_0: tatra bhagavān vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv171u:296_2: mukto 'haṃ, bhikṣavaḥ, sarvapāśebhyo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ;
V03vinv171u:296_3: yūyam api bhikṣavo muktāḥ sarvapāśebhyo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ;
V03vinv171u:296_4: tato bhikṣavaś cārikāṃ prakramiśyāmo bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām;
