V03vinv171u:315_7: paścimāyām, uttarasyāṃ diśi; iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya yena bhagavāṃs tena añjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat;
V03vinv171u:315_10: evam etat kāśyapa, [evam etat kāśyapa], śrāvakas tvaṃ mama śāstā te 'haṃ kāśyapa;
V03vinv171u:315_11: śrāvakas tvaṃ mama; niṣīda tvaṃ (SBV I 157) kāśyapa yathāsvake āsane;
V03vinv171u:315_12: athāyuṣmān urubilvākāśyapo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:315_14: na haiva mahāśramaṇa urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ carati;
V03vinv171u:315_15: api tu urubilvākāśyapa eva jaṭilo mahāśramaṇasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti
V03vinv171u:317_0: The sermon of the Buddha on the production and passing away by dependence
V03vinv171u:318_0: tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāram āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:318_2: vyayate 'pi; tasyotpādo 'pi veditavyaḥ, vyayo 'pi; vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ mahārāja utpadyate 'pi;
V03vinv171u:318_3: vyayate 'pi; tasyotpādo 'pi veditvyaḥ, vyayo 'pi; rūpasya mahārāja kulaputra utpādavyayadharmatāṃ viditvā tad rūpaṃ parijānāti;
V03vinv171u:318_4: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya mahārāja kulaputra utpādavyayadharmatāṃ viditvā tad vijñānaṃ parijānāti;
V03vinv171u:318_6: nopādatte, nādhitiṣṭhati, nābhiniviśati ātmā me iti; vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ mahārāja kulaputra parijānan nopaiti,
V03vinv171u:318_7: nopādatte, nādhitiṣṭhati, nābhiniviśati ātmā me iti; rūpaṃ mahārāja kulaputra anupāyantam anupādadānam anadhitiṣṭhantam anabhiniviśantam anātmamamāyamānam aprameyam asaṅkhyeyaṃ nirvṛtam iti vadāmi;
V03vinv171u:318_8: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ mahārāja kulaputra anupāyantam anupādadānam anadhitiṣṭhantam anabhiniviśamānam anātmamamāyamānam aprameyam asaṅkhyeyaṃ nirvṛtam iti vadāmi;
V03vinv171u:318_10: sati khalu rūpam anātmā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam anātmā;
V03vinv171u:318_11: atha ko nv asau bhaviṣyaty ātmā vā satvo jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā kartā vā kārako vā janako vā saṃjanako vā utthāpako vā samutthāpako (SBV I 158) vā vadako vā vedako vā [pratisaṃvedako vā],
V03vinv171u:318_12: yo na jantur nābhūn, na bhaviṣyati; nāpy etarhi vidyate; yas tatra kṛtākṛtānāṃ kalyāṇapāpakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate;
V03vinv171u:318_13: ya imāṃś ca skandhān nikṣipaty anyāṃś ca skandhān pratisaṃdadhāti
V03vinv171u:320_0: The sermon of the Buddha on the unreality of the Self
V03vinv171u:321_0: atha bhagavān māgadhakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma;
V03vinv171u:321_1: ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptim anupatito na cātrāsty ātmā nātmīyaṃ vā;
V03vinv171u:321_5: niruddhyamānā niruddhyante; tān hetūṃs tān pratyayān pratītya satvānāṃ saṃskārasantatiḥ pravartate;
V03vinv171u:321_6: saṃskārasantatipratisandhiṃ khalu bhikṣavas tathāgato viditvā satvānāṃ cyutyupapādaṃ prajñāpayati;
V03vinv171u:321_7: paśyāmy ahaṃ bhikṣavo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvān;
V03vinv171u:321_8: paśyāmi cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api,
V03vinv171u:321_9: durvarṇān api, hīnān api, praṇītān api, sugatim api gacchato, durgatim api gacchataḥ; yathākarmopagān satvān yathābhūtān prajānāmi;
V03vinv171u:321_10: amī bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakāḥ,
V03vinv171u:321_11: mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante;
V03vinv171u:321_12: amī vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena [A_407b] samanvāgatā vāṅmanassucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante;
V03vinv171u:321_13: evaṃ cāhaṃ bhikṣavo jānāmy evaṃ paśyāmi;
V03vinv171u:321_14: na cāham evaṃ vadāmy ayaṃ me ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā kartā vā kārako vā janako vā saṃjanako vā utthāpako vā samutthāpako vā vadako vā vedako vā pratisaṃvedako vā,
V03vinv171u:321_15: yo na jantur nābhūn na bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv171u:321_16: nāpy etarhi vidyate; yas tatra kṛtākṛtānāṃ kalyāṇāpāpakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate;
V03vinv171u:321_17: imāṃś ca skandhān nikṣipaty anyāṃś ca skandhān pratisandadhāti,
V03vinv171u:321_18: nānyatra dharmasaṅketāt; tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṅketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati;
V03vinv171u:321_21: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam; vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam; nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam;
V03vinv171u:321_22: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ; sparśapratyayā vedanā; vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā; tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam; upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ; bhavapratyayā jātiḥ; jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti;
V03vinv171u:321_23: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
V03vinv171u:321_24: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati; asya nirodhād idaṃ niruddhyate;
V03vinv171u:321_35: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati;
V03vinv171u:321_38: hetunirodhād duḥkhanirodhaḥ; chinnaṃ vartma na pravartate;
V03vinv171u:321_39: apratisandhi niruddhyate; eṣa evānto duḥkhasya; tatra bhikṣavaḥ kaḥ parinirvṛto nānyatra duḥkhaṃ,
V03vinv171u:321_40: tan niruddhaṃ; tad vyupaśāntaṃ, [A_408a] tac chītībhūtam; śāntam idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ padaṃ yaduta sarvopadhipratiniḥsargaḥ,
V03vinv171u:324_0: tatra bhagavān dvir api rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāram āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:324_1: kiṃ mayase mahārāja rūpaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā? anityam idaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:324_2: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā duḥkham? duḥkham idaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:324_4: api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
V03vinv171u:324_5: eṣo 'ham asmi, eṣa me ātmeti? no bhadanta; kiṃ mahārāja vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā? anityam idaṃ bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:324_6: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā duḥkham;
V03vinv171u:324_7: duḥkham idaṃ bhadanta; yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharmi;
V03vinv171u:324_8: api nu tacchrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan (SBV I 160) mama,
V03vinv171u:324_9: eṣo 'ham asmi, eṣa me ātmeti? no bhadanta; tasmāt tarhi te mahārāja yat kiṃcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā odārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā,
V03vinv171u:324_10: yad vā dūre, yad vā antike, tat sarvaṃ naitan mama naiṣo 'ham asmi,
V03vinv171u:324_11: naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam;
V03vinv171u:324_12: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja yā kācid vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yat kiṃcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā,
V03vinv171u:324_13: bāhyaṃ vā, odārikaṃ vā, sūkṣmaṃ vā, hīnaṃ vā, praṇītaṃ vā, yad vā dūre, yad vā antike, tat sarvaṃ naitan mama, naiṣo 'ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam;
V03vinv171u:324_14: evaṃdarśī mahārāja śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ rūpād api nirvidyate;
V03vinv171u:324_15: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyā saṃskārebhyo vijñānād api nirvidyate;
V03vinv171u:324_16: nirviṇṇo virajyate; virakto vimucyate; vimuktasya vimuktam eva jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati;
V03vinv171u:324_17: kṣīṇā me jātir, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryam; kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti
V03vinv171u:324_18: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam;
V03vinv171u:324_19: aśiteś ca devatāsahasrāṇām, anekeṣāṃ ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśatasahasrāṇām;
V03vinv171u:324_20: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:324_23: dharmaṃ ca, bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca; upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam,
V03vinv171u:324_25: ahaṃ [A_408b] bhagavantam upasthāsyami yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅgheneti;
V03vinv171u:324_26: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv171u:324_27: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:324_30: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv171u:324_31: kiṃ bhadanta rājñā māgadhena śreṇyena bimbisāreṇa saparivāreṇa karma kṛtaṃ,
V03vinv171u:324_32: yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato 'ntike satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti;
V03vinv171u:324_33: bhagavān āha: bimbisāreṇaiva (SBV I 161) bhikṣavo rājñā saparivāreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni;
V03vinv171u:324_34: rājñā bimbisāreṇa saparivāreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:324_35: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv171u:324_36: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca
V03vinv171u:324_37: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv171u:324_38: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv171u:326_0: The story of the king Kṛki
V03vinv171u:327_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava atīte 'dhvani aranābhī nāma śāstā loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamayasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv171u:327_1: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:327_2: tasya mahājanakāyena śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā viviktāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe mahān stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:327_3: tena khalu samayena kṛkir nāma rājā cakravartī aṣṭādaśabhir bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhir upari vihāyasā anusaṃyān tasya stūpasya samīpam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:327_5: kṛkī rājā saṃlakṣayati: yathaitac cakraratnam avasthitaṃ,
V03vinv171u:327_7: tasya devatābhir ārocitam: mahārāja na te puṇyaparikṣayaḥ;
V03vinv171u:327_8: kintv aranābheḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya etasmin pradeśe stūpam;
V03vinv171u:327_10: na tasyopariṣṭād gacchatīti; tataḥ kṛkī rājā aṣṭādaśabhir bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ sahāvatīrṇo yāvat paśyati stūpam asaṃmṛṣṭam;
V03vinv171u:327_11: tena saparivāreṇa saṃmṛjya gandhair mālyair dhūpaiś cūrṇair vādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya saparivāreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv171u:327_12: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣinīye kārāḥ kṛtāḥ,
V03vinv171u:327_13: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena evaṃvidhānām guṇānāṃ lābhī syām;
V03vinv171u:327_15: mā virāgayeyam iti; kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena,
V03vinv171u:327_16: tena [A_409a] samayena kṛkir nāma rājābhūc cakravartī saparivāra eṣa evāsau rājā bimbisāraḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv171u:327_17: yad anena aranābhes samyaksaṃbuddhasya (SBV I 162) stūpe saparivāreṇa pūjā kṛtā,
V03vinv171u:327_18: tasya karmaṇo vipākena anekāni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi divyamānuṣaṃ ca prativiśiṣṭaṃ sukham anubhūtam;
V03vinv171u:327_19: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām iti;
V03vinv171u:327_21: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyam,
V03vinv171u:327_22: mā virāgayeyam iti; aham asmi bhikṣavo aranābhinā samyaksaṃbuddhena samasamaṃ samajavaḥ,
V03vinv171u:327_23: samabalaḥ, samadhuraḥ, samasāmānyaprāptaḥ, śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ; iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
V03vinv171u:327_25: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
V03vinv171u:327_28: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśāyacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv171u:327_29: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā urubilvākāśyapena karma kṛtaṃ,
V03vinv171u:327_32: bhagavān āha: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ
V03vinv171u:329_0: The story of the three sons of a Gṛhapati
V03vinv171u:330_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prayājāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv171u:330_1: sa vārāṇasīnagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv171u:330_2: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_3: tasya kṛkinā rājñā sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā śarīraṃ dhyāpitam;
V03vinv171u:330_4: sā citā kṣīreṇa nirvāpitā; tāny asthīni catūratnamaye kumbhe prakṣipya viviktāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe śārīraḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
V03vinv171u:330_6: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv171u:330_8: sa (SBV I 163) tayā sārdhām krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv171u:330_9: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kramaśaḥ trayaḥ putrā jātāḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_13: sa kāladharmaṇā saṃyuktaḥ; tatas taiḥ putrair nīlapītalohitāvadātair vastraiḥ [A_409b] śibikām alaṅkṛtya śmaśānaṃ nītvā dhyāpitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_14: śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā pituś ca pitṛkāryāṇi dravyavibhāgasañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_15: jyeṣṭho bhrātā kathayati: dravyaṃ vibhajāma iti; tau kanīyāṃsau bhrātarau necchataḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_17: tau kathayataḥ: yady evaṃ pāralaukikaṃ pathyadanaṃ gṛhṇīmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_19: sa kathayati: kiṃ kurmaḥ? tau kathayataḥ: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjām iti;
V03vinv171u:330_20: sa duḥśraddadhānaḥ; tena kṛcchreṇa pratijñātam; tatas te kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhaysa pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_22: anena kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
V03vinv171u:330_23: tasyāvāṃ śāsane pravrajeva viśesaṃ cādhigacchāva iti;
V03vinv171u:330_24: tayoḥ praṇidhānaṃ śrutvā sa jyeṣṭho bhrātā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_26: anena kuślamūlena mamāpy asau śākyamuniḥ pañcabhiḥ prātihāryaśataiḥ vinīyāt,
V03vinv171u:330_27: pravrājayet; prarajitaś ca viśeṣam adhigaccheyam iti;
V03vinv171u:330_28: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau jyeṣṭho bhrātā khaṭuṃkaḥ duḥśraddadhānaḥ eṣa evāsau urubilvākāśyapaḥ;
V03vinv171u:330_29: yau tau kanīyāṃsau bhrātarau etāv etau nadīgayākāśyapau;
V03vinv171u:330_30: tatpraṇidhānavaśād urubilvākāśyapaḥ pañcabhiḥ prātihāryaśatair vinītaḥ nadīgayākāśyapau tu alpakṛcchreṇa vinītau
V03vinv171u:333_4: yāvad bimbisāreṇa bahirnirgatena tad udyānaṃ dṛṣṭam;
V03vinv171u:333_8: sa kathayati: kumāra, kāmam ahaṃ deśaparityāgaṃ kuryāṃ,
V03vinv171u:333_9: na codyānaṃ dadyām iti; bimbisāraḥ kumāraḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:333_11: yadā ahaṃ rājā bhaviṣyāmi, tadā svayam eva grahīṣyāmīti;
V03vinv171u:333_12: sa kathayati: yadā tvaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi, tadā ahaṃ rājagṛhāt prakramiṣyāmīti;
V03vinv171u:333_13: bimbisāraḥ kumāro hum iti kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_14: yāvad apareṇa samayena mahāpadmo rājā kālagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_15: bimbisāraḥ kumāro rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ tena tad udyānaṃ haṭhāt gṛhītam;
V03vinv171u:333_20: yāvad rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye puṣpiteṣu pādapeṣv antaḥpurasahīyas tad udyānaṃ nirgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_21: sa tatra niṣpuruṣeṇa antaḥpurajanena sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ pratyanubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_23: ekā strī khaḍgaṃ rājña ārakṣikā sthāpitā .
V03vinv171u:333_25: tais tam āśīviṣaṃ parivārya kalakalāśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_26: yaṃ śrutvā asidhāriṇyā striyā khadgena jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_29: kim etad iti; tayā striyābhihitam: deva eṣa āśīviṣaḥ devaṃ daṣṭum abisaṃprasthitaḥ kalandakaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ kolāhalaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ mayā jīvitād vyaparopita iti;
V03vinv171u:333_30: rājñas tām avasthāṃ pratiśrutya kumārabhaṭabalāgraḥ rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ sannipatitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_31: antar bahis tad udyānaṃ mahatā kolahalaśabdena kṣobhitum ārabdham;
V03vinv171u:333_34: tato rājā kathayati: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ jīvitenācchādayati,
V03vinv171u:333_35: kas tasya vara iti; janakāyaḥ kathayati: upārdhaṃ rājyasyeti; rājā kathayati: bhavantaḥ kalandakaiḥ pakṣibhir mama jīvitaṃ dattam;
V03vinv171u:333_36: tad ebhyo dattam upārdhaṃ rājyasya iti;
V03vinv171u:333_37: amātyāḥ kathayanti: deva pakṣiṇa ete tiryagyonigatāḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_38: kim eṣām upārdharājyena; yasminn ete veṇuvane prativasanti tatraiṣāṃ nivāpaḥ prajñapyatām iti;
V03vinv171u:333_39: rājā kathayati: evaṃ kriyatām iti; tad udyānaṃ veṇuvanapariveṣṭitam;
V03vinv171u:333_41: tasya veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpa iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:333_42: rājño bimbisārasya mātula ājīvikānāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:333_43: tena tad udyānaṃ tasmai nivāsāya dattaṃ
V03vinv171u:335_0: Bimbisāra presents Veṇuvana to the Buddha
V03vinv171u:336_0: yāvad bhagavān magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāpto 'nyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:336_2: bhagavān māgadhesu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāpto 'nyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vatiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv171u:336_4: mahatā rājānubhāvena, rājagṛhān niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:336_5: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:336_6: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān ramyayā kathayā sandarśayati,
V03vinv171u:336_7: samādāpayati, samuttejayati, saṃpraharṣayati; anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā sandarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv171u:336_8: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāra [utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsangaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:336_9: adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃś śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena:
V03vinv171u:336_10: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya tūṣṇimbhāvena;
V03vinv171u:336_11: ] atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:336_12: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:336_13: rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāras tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kalyam evotthāyāsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
V03vinv171u:336_14: samayo (SBV I 166) bhadanta; sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyate iti;
V03vinv171u:336_16: pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṅghapuraskṛto yena rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya nivāsas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:336_17: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṅghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:336_18: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati,
V03vinv171u:336_19: saṃpravārayati; anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya,
V03vinv171u:336_20: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā tad udyānaṃ bhagavate niryātayati:
V03vinv171u:336_21: idaṃ bhadanta veṇuvanaṃ, kalandakanivāpam; atra bhagavān viharatu yathāsukham iti;
V03vinv171u:336_23: bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpa iti
V03vinv171u:339_0: tena khalu samayena bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv171u:339_1: rājagṛhe 'nyatamo gṛhapatiḥ; tena bhagavān gṛhe upanimantritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv171u:339_2: tasmiṃś ca samaye anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv171u:339_3: sa tasya gṛhapater niveśane rātriṃ vāsam upagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_4: atha sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:339_6: kaṣṭhāni pāṭayata; samidhaṃ prajvālayata; bhaktaṃ pacata; sūpikaṃ pacata; khādyakāny ullāḍayata; pratijāgṛta maṇḍalavāṭam iti;
V03vinv171u:339_8: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv171u:339_9: vivāho vā, rāṣṭraṃ vā, śreṇī vā, pūgā vā parṣado vā rājā [vā] anena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena nimantrito bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:339_10: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:339_11: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā śreṇī vā pūgā vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ? na me gṛhapate āvāho,
V03vinv171u:339_12: na vivāho, na rāṣṭraṃ, na śreṇī, na pūgā, nāpi parṣado, nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_14: (SBV I 167) anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny āhṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:339_15: sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:339_16: ka eṣa gṛhapate buddho nāma; asti gṛhapate śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_18: sa eṣa gṛhapate buddho nāma; ka eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma; santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇy [vastrāṇy] ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā [agārād anāgarikāṃ] tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_19: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā [agārād anāgārikāṃ] tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_20: sa eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma; śvaḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_21: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati? asminn eva rājagṛhe śītavane śmaśāne;
V03vinv171u:339_23: tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam;
V03vinv171u:339_24: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
V03vinv171u:339_25: anāthapiṇdado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_27: tena khalu samayena śivikādvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati,
V03vinv171u:339_28: pūrvakaṃ paścimakaṃ ca, māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighāto bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv171u:339_30: sālokena ca sphuṭam; tasyaitad abhavat: nūnaṃ prabhātā rajanī; tathāhi śivikādvāraṃ vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:339_31: iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_33: andhakāraṃ prādurbhūtam; tasyābhūd bhayam; abhūc chambhitatvam; abhūd romaharṣaḥ; māhaiva kaścid viheṭhayen manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptaṃ vā svāt prabhūtam kulaśulkam iti;
V03vinv171u:339_34: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,
V03vinv171u:339_35: namaskaroti ca; atha madhuskandhadevaputrasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:339_37: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatā namaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv171u:339_38: iti viditvā yāvac ca śivikādvāraṃ yāvac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:339_39: abhikrama gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati,
V03vinv171u:339_40: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam āśvatarīrathāḥ /
V03vinv171u:339_43: abhikrama gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo [bhavati],
V03vinv171u:339_47: abhikrama gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas [A_411b] te śreyo bhavati;
V03vinv171u:339_51: abhikrama gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati,
V03vinv171u:339_52: na pratikramataḥ; athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam (SBV I 169) avocat:
V03vinv171u:339_53: kas tvaṃ bhadramukha; aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ,
V03vinv171u:339_54: tavaiva purāṇo gṛhasakhaḥ; so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasāya [kālagataḥ] cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
V03vinv171u:339_56: tasmād aham evaṃ vadāmi: abhikrama gṛhapate mā pratikrama;
V03vinv171u:339_58: na pratikramata iti; athānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:339_59: nāvaro buddho bhaviṣyati, nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānaṃ, yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya bhagavato darśanāya;
V03vinv171u:339_60: iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_61: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrame caṅkramyate yadbhūyasā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhaptim āgamayamānaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_62: adrākṣīt anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv171u:339_63: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_66: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
V03vinv171u:339_67: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ /
V03vinv171u:339_68: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
V03vinv171u:339_71: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_72: anāthapiṇdado gṛhapatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaṇ;
V03vinv171u:339_73: ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati [samuttejyati],
V03vinv171u:339_74: saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv171u:339_75: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām aśvādādīnavasaṅkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveke anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:339_76: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittam kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv171u:339_77: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:339_78: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:339_79: tadyathā (SBV I 170) duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ;
V03vinv171u:339_80: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv171u:339_81: evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:339_82: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti;
V03vinv171u:339_83: anāthapiṇḍado [A_412a] gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv171u:339_84: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:339_86: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:339_87: upāsakaṃ māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv171u:339_88: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat;
V03vinv171u:339_89: kinnāmā tvaṃ gṛhapate? aham asmi bhadanta sudatto nāmnā;
V03vinv171u:339_91: tato mām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;
V03vinv171u:339_92: kutobhūmakas tvaṃ gṛhapate? asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ nigamaḥ;
V03vinv171u:341_0: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī
V03vinv171u:342_0: āgacchatu bhagavān śrāvastīm; ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv171u:342_1: santi gṛhapate vihārāḥ śrāvastyām? no bhadanta;
V03vinv171u:342_2: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv171u:342_3: āgacchatu bhagavān; ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā bhaviṣyanti;
V03vinv171u:342_4: bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
V03vinv171u:342_6: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā (SBV I 171) vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:342_7: tato 'sya yāvad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:342_8: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:342_10: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṃ sahāyakam yena sahāyakena bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv171u:342_11: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: katarasya bhikṣor anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro [śrāvastīnivāsī ca janakāyo] vidheya;
V03vinv171u:342_14: saṃanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim [saparivāraṃ] śrāvastīnivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam iti;
V03vinv171u:342_16: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'nitkāt prakrānataḥ
V03vinv171u:345_0: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputras tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhāṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat;
V03vinv171u:345_1: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamayya,
V03vinv171u:345_2: samādāya pātracīvaraṃ, yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:345_3: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ sa praviśann eva śrāvastīm ārāmeṇārāmam [A_412b] udyānenodyānam upavanenopavanaṃ caṅkramam anucaṅkramyamāṇo suvicarann evam āha:
V03vinv171u:345_4: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīrṇo 'lpavilāpo rātrāv alpaśabdo 'lpanirghoṣaḥ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśaḥ,
V03vinv171u:345_6: adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumarasyārāmaṃ śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākirṇam alpavilāpaṃ rātrāv alpaśabdam alpanirghoṣam alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasparśam;
V03vinv171u:345_9: sa praviṣann eva svaṃ niveśanaṃ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:345_12: (SBV I 172) ahaṃ tatra bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmi iti;
V03vinv171u:345_13: sa kathayati:na me gṛhapate sa ārāmaḥ; kintu udyānaṃ tan memeti; dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:345_17: punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:345_19: pratīccha hiraṇyasuvarṇam; mamārāmaḥ; kaḥ kṛtārghaḥ? tvaṃ kṛtārghaḥ;
V03vinv171u:345_20: tau kṛtārgho na kṛtārgha iti vivādam āpannau,
V03vinv171u:345_23: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir udyukto bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum;
V03vinv171u:345_24: sāhāyyam asyānuṣṭheyam iti; tato vyāvahārikapuruṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya arthādhikaraṇe niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv171u:345_25: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaś ca kumāro vyāvahārikasakāśam upasaṅkrāntau;
V03vinv171u:345_26: athānāthapiṇḍako gṛhapatir vyāvahārikapuruṣāṇām etam arthaṃ vistareṇa nivedayati;
V03vinv171u:345_28: pratīccha suvarṇam: gṛhapater ārāma iti; sa tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śakatair bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakair uṣṭrair gobhir gardbhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ suvarṇam abhinirhṛtya,
V03vinv171u:345_30: na parisamāpyate; tiṣṭhate evānāstīrṇaḥ kaścit pṛthivīpradeśaḥ;
V03vinv171u:345_31: tataḥ anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir etam arthaṃ cintayan muhūrtasṃ tūṣṇīm asthāt:
V03vinv171u:345_33: nātiprabhūtaṃ yena ayam anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati;
V03vinv171u:345_35: jetaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati: nūnam anāthapiṇḍadsya gṛhapater vipratisāraḥ,
V03vinv171u:345_36: kasmād ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajāmi;
V03vinv171u:345_37: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:345_38: sacet te ha gṛhapate vipratisāraḥ pratīccha suvarṇam;
V03vinv171u:345_39: mamaivārāmaḥ; na me kumāra vipratisāraḥ; api tv aham etam evārtham anucintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:345_40: katarat tan nidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati? nātistokaṃ nātiprabhūtaṃ,
V03vinv171u:345_45: nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānam; yatredānīm ayaṃ gṛhapatir ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ (SBV I 173) mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajati;
V03vinv171u:345_46: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:345_49: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumārasya anāstīrṇaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam anuprayacchati:
V03vinv171u:345_50: yatra jetaḥ kumāro bhagavato 'rthāya dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ māpayati
V03vinv171u:348_0: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum ārabdha iti tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasas tīrthyās te saṃbhūya yenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:348_1: upasaṅkramya kathayanti: mā tvaṃ gṛhapate śramaṇasya gautamasya arthāyātra vihāraṃ kāraya;
V03vinv171u:348_4: asmākaṃ śrāvastī; sa kathayati: bhājitāni yuṣmābhir nagarāṇi,
V03vinv171u:348_5: na tu madīyaṃ svāpateyam; yasyābhipretaṃ tasya dharmaskandhaṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv171u:348_6: te rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ; tatrāpy anāthapiṇḍadena parājitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:348_10: ca yady asmān vādena parājayate kāraya vihāram iti;
V03vinv171u:348_11: sa kathayati: obnanam; āryaśāriputraṃ tāvad avalokayāmīti;
V03vinv171u:348_13: upasaṅkramyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:348_14: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:348_19: kāraya vihāram iti; katham atra pratipattavyam iti;
V03vinv171u:348_21: kim eṣāṃ santi kānicit kuśalamūlāni uta na santīti;
V03vinv171u:348_22: paśyati, santi; kasyāntike pratibaddhāni; mamaiva; punaḥ saṃlakṣayati: kim etāvanta eva mama pratibaddhā vineyā āhosvid anye 'pi vādena vineyāḥ santīti;
V03vinv171u:348_23: paśyati, santi; kiyaccireṇa sannipatiṣyanti; paśyati, saptāhasyātyayād iti; samanvāhṛtya kathayati: gṛhapate evaṃ bhavatu; kiṃ tu saptame divase; tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prītiprāmodyajāto yena tīrthyās tena upasaṅkrāntah;
V03vinv171u:348_26: śobhanam, evaṃ bhavatu; kiṃ tu spatame divase iti; te saṃlakṣayanti; dvābhyām atra kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavitavyam;
V03vinv171u:348_28: kim atra prāptakālaṃ; vayam api pakṣaṃ samanveṣāmaha iti;
V03vinv171u:348_30: taiḥ pakṣaṃ samanveṣamānai raktākṣo nāma parivrājako dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv171u:348_31: sa tair uktaḥ: tvam asmākaṃ sabrahmacārī; śramaṇasya gautamasyāgraśrāvako 'smābhir vādenāhūtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:348_35: śobhanam, evaṃ bhavatu; yadā yuṣmākaṃ sannipāto bhavati tadā mamārocayitavyam;
V03vinv171u:351_0: yāvat saptame divase anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā;
V03vinv171u:351_3: śrāvastīnivāsī janakāyaḥ anekāni ca tatsāmantanivāsīni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi,
V03vinv171u:351_4: kānicir kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni;
V03vinv171u:351_5: tata āyuṣmān śāriputro 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā saparivāreṇa saṃpuraskṛto vādimaṇḍalaṃ praviśya vineyajanam abhisamīkṣya smitapūrvaṃ samaśānteryāpathena siṃhāsanam abhiruhya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:351_6: sarvaiva sā parṣad avahitacetaskā āyuṣmantam śāriputram abhisamīkṣamāṇā niṣaṇṇā
V03vinv171u:354_1: bhavantaḥ kiṃ tāvat kariṣyatha? āhosivd vikariṣyatha? te kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:354_2: vayaṃ kurmaḥ; tvāṃ vikuru; āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:354_3: yady ahaṃ kariṣyāmi; sadevako 'pi loko na śakṣyati vikartum;
V03vinv171u:354_5: iti viditvā raktākṣaṃ parivrājakam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:354_6: tvaṃ kuru, ahaṃ vikariṣyāmīti; sa indrajāle kṛtāvī; tena supuṣpitaḥ (SBV I 175) sahakārapādapo nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_8: yenāsau samūla utpāṭya itaś cāmutaś ca vikīrṇo yogijanānām apy aviṣayībhūtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_9: tatas tena padminī nirmitā; āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa kalabhahastī nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_10: tena sā samantān marditā; tena saptaśīrṣo nāgo nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_11: āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa garuḍo nirmitaḥ yenāsāv apahṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_12: tena vetāḍo nirmitaḥ; āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa mantraiḥ kīlitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_14: sa tasyaivopari pradhāvitaḥ; tato 'sau bhītas trastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādayor nipatitaḥ:
V03vinv171u:354_17: sa vetāḍo vyupaśāntaḥ; tasyāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_18: sa prasādajātaḥ kathayati: labheyāham āryaśāriputra svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:354_21: avavādo dattaḥ; tenodyacchamena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam;
V03vinv171u:354_22: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ; traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo [A_414a] vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhaparāṅmukhaḥ,
V03vinv171u:354_23: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_27: iti viditvā ayuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya mukhe 'valokikāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_28: tata āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā;
V03vinv171u:354_29: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ satvasahasraiḥ mahān viśeṣa āgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_31: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau; kaiśid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
V03vinv171u:354_34: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam; kaiścid anāgāmiphalam; kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśasaṃprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam;
V03vinv171u:354_36: dharmapravaṇā, saṅghaprāgbhārā, (SBV I 176) vyavasthāpitā; tīrthyāḥ saṃlakṣayanti: na śakyam asmābhir ayaṃ vāde nigrahītum;
V03vinv171u:354_37: upāyasaṃvidhānaṃ kartavyam; atraiva bhṛtikayā karma kurmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_38: tataś chidraṃ labdhvā baiṣkeṇainaṃ praghātayāma iti;
V03vinv171u:354_39: te sarve saṃbhūya anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:354_41: tad anukampāṃ kuru; tvadīyavihāre bhṛtikayā karma kurmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_42: ciraṃ vayam atra avasthitāḥ; mā deśaparityāgaṃ kurma iti; anāthapiṇḍadaḥ kathayati: āryaśāriputraṃ tāvad avalokayāmi;
V03vinv171u:354_45: [ārya], tīrthyāḥ kathayanti, asmākaṃ tvayā sarvāṇi vṛttipadāni samucchinnāni;
V03vinv171u:354_46: tad anukampāṃ kuru; tvadīye vihāre bhṛtikayā karma kurmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_47: ciraṃ vayam atrāvasthitāḥ; mā deśaparityāgaṃ kurma iti; āyuṣmāṃś chāriputraḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ:
V03vinv171u:354_48: kiṃ teṣāṃ santi kānicit kuśalamūlāni āhosvin na santi iti;
V03vinv171u:354_49: paśyati, santi; kasyāntike pratibaddhāni; mamaiveti; samanvāhṛtya kathayati: gṛhapate evaṃ bhavatu, ko 'tra virodha iti; te tasmin vihāre bhṛtikayā karma kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_50: āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa latāvārikaḥ puruṣo raudro nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_52: āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ teṣāṃ vinayakālaṃ jñātvā tatsamīpe vṛkṣamūlasyādhastāc caṅkramyamāṇas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:354_53: dṛṣṭaḥ; te saṃlakṣayanti, ayam asya kāla praghātayituṃ pravivikte tiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv171u:354_54: te tasya sakāśaṃ upasaṅkramya parivārya avasthitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_56: kīdṛśena cittena ete matsakāśam upasaṅkrāntā iti;
V03vinv171u:354_60: te kathayanti: ārya śāriputra paritrāyasva; sa kathayati: āyuṣman gaccha; viśrāmyantu tāvad iti; te saṃlakṣayanti: īdṛśo 'sty ayaṃ mahātmā; vayam asya vadhakacittāḥ; eṣo 'smākaṃ maitracittaḥ iti viditvā abhiprasannāḥ;
V03vinv171u:354_61: tata āyuṣmatā (SBV I 177) śāriputreṇa teṣām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā [A_414b] yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ
V03vinv171u:357_0: te dṛṣṭasatyāḥ kathayanti: labhemahi vayaṃ śāriputra svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:357_3: avavādo dattaḥ; tair yujyamānair, ghaṭamānair, vyāyacchamānair idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaparahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ity arhantaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv171u:357_4: traidhātukavītarāgāḥ samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhāḥ sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ
V03vinv171u:360_0: tatra āyuṣmatā śariputreṇa vihārasūtram ekānte gṛhītam;
V03vinv171u:360_4: nāhetvapratyayam āryaśāriputra tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti;
V03vinv171u:360_5: kaḥ āryaśāriputra hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya? evam etad gṛhapate,
V03vinv171u:360_6: evam etat; nāhetvapratyayaṃ tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti;
V03vinv171u:360_7: tvayā ceha sūtraṃ gṛhītam; tuṣite devanikāye sauvarṇaṃ bhavanam abhinirvṛttam;
V03vinv171u:360_9: āryaśāriputra yady evaṃ, tena hi punaḥ sūtraṃ prasāraya bhūyasyā mātrayā;
V03vinv171u:360_10: cittam abhiprasādayāmīti; āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa tat sūtram gṛhītam;
V03vinv171u:360_11: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā bhūyasyā mātrayā tīvreṇa prasādavagena cittam abhiprasāditam;

V03vinv171u:387_1: dvāre sthitvā vaktavyam, śākyabhikṣur āgata iti; yadi kathayanti praviśeti, praveṣṭavyam; praviṣṭasya yadi kathayanti, santy anye 'pi śākyabhikṣava iti,

V03vinv171u:402_0: tato bhagavatā nyagrodhārāme tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca ñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā śuddhodanapramukhaiḥ saptasaptatyā śākyasahasraiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ sthāpayitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ;

V03vinv171u:402_3: yanv aham apīdṛśīm anvāvartanīṃ māyāṃ jānīyām;

V03vinv171u:405_38: api tu santy anye 'pi pravrajitā evaṃmahardhikā [A_420b] evaṃmahānubhāvā iti;
V03vinv171u:405_39: tasya yad audbilyam abhūt tat prativigatam;
V03vinv171u:405_43: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittam utpādayanti tadā kuntapipīlakā api prāṇinas tasmin samaye bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājānanti;
V03vinv171u:405_45: yasmiṃs tu samaye lokottaraṃ cittam utpādayanti tasmin samaye mahāśrāvakā api bhagavataś cetasā cittaṃ nājānanti;
V03vinv171u:407_0: The Buddha teaches to the Gods
V03vinv171u:408_1: kimarthaṃ thagavatā laukikaṃ cittam utpāditam iti;
V03vinv171u:408_2: tasyaitad abhavat: śuddhāyāṃ devaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayitukāma iti;
V03vinv171u:408_5: vicitrāṃ cāsanaprajñaptim; bhagavān śuddhāyaṃ devaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayitukāma iti;
V03vinv171u:408_7: viśvakarmā devaputraḥ śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya nyagrodhārāme catūratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ nirmiṇoti,
V03vinv171u:408_8: vicitrāṃ cāsanaprajñaptim; tatra catvāro mahārājāś caturṣu dvāreṣv avasthitāḥ,
V03vinv171u:408_9: dhṛtarāṣṭro, virūḍhakaḥ, virūpākṣaḥ, kuberaś ca; pūrvasmin dvāre dhṛtarāṣṭra (SBV I 197) aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇavibhūṣitaḥ,
V03vinv171u:408_13: tataḥ śakro devendro nyagrodhārāme mahatīṃ vibhūtiṃ kārayitvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_15: tato bhagavān śakrādibhir anekair devatāśatasahasraiṛ parivṛtaḥ kūṭāgāraṃ praviśya mahatyā devaparṣadaḥ purastān nānāratnavibhūṣite siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_16: atha āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano rājānaṃ śuddhodanam ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_20: kiṃ kāraṇam? bhagavān śuddhāyāṃ devaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv171u:408_22: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ dakṣiṇaṃ dvāraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_25: rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati: kas tvaṃ bhadramukha; aham asmi mahārāja virūḍhakaḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_27: nātra manuṣyapraveśo 'stīti; atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ paścimaṃ dvāraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_29: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mahārāja, mā pravikṣaḥ; rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati, kas tvaṃ bhadramukha; virūpākṣaḥ kathayati; aham asmi mahārāja virūpākṣaḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_32: atha rājā śuddhodana uttaraṃ dvāraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:408_35: rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati, kas tvaṃ bhadramukha; [A_421a] vaiśravaṇaḥ kathayati,
V03vinv171u:408_40: aho batāhaṃ bhagavantam śuddhāyāṃ devaparśadi dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:408_41: tato rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya yāsau līnā santatiḥ sā prativigatā;
V03vinv171u:408_42: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: rājā śuddhodano yadi māṃ na paśyati,
V03vinv171u:408_43: sthānam etad vidyate yad uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv171u:408_45: bhagavatā yat tat catūratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ tat sphaṭikamayaṃ nirmitam;
V03vinv171u:408_46: yena rājā śuddhodana anāvṛtaṃ buddhaśarīraṃ paśyati;
V03vinv171u:408_47: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prītiprāmodyajātaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ
V03vinv171u:411_0: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
V03vinv171u:411_1: yāṃ śrutvā rājñā śuddhodanena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāktkṛtam;
V03vinv171u:411_3: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtam;
V03vinv171u:411_4: na pitrā, na rājñā, na devatābhiḥ, na pūrvapretaiḥ, na śramaṇabrāhmaṇaiḥ, nānyena svajanabandhuvargeṇa,
V03vinv171u:411_5: yad bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam; ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ;
V03vinv171u:411_7: tat tvayā kṛtam asmākaṃ cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇam //
V03vinv171u:411_8: durgatibhyaḥ samuddṛtya svarge mokṣe ca te vayam /
V03vinv171u:411_9: sthāpitā suprayatnena sādhu te duṣkaraṃ kṛtam //
V03vinv171u:411_10: vaṇijā iva lobhena svargalobhena te vayam /
V03vinv171u:411_12: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:411_14: sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena; adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv171u:411_15: atha rājā śuddhodano bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena śuklodanas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:411_18: pratīccha rājyam; kasyārthe? yato bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyāni dṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:411_19: katarasmin divase? adyaiva; (SBV I 199) mayā yam eva divasaṃ bhagavatā nyagrodhārāme dharmo deśitas tam eva divasaṃ saptasaptatyā śākyasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ satyāni dṛṣṭānīti;
V03vinv171u:411_21: sa kathayati: yadā bhagavatā brahmāvarte udyāne dharmo deśitas tadā ṣaṭsaptatyā śākyasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ satyāni dṛṣṭānīti;
V03vinv171u:411_22: evam amṛtodano rājyaṃ pratīcchety uktaḥ sa kathayati,
V03vinv171u:411_23: mayāpi yadā bhagavatā rohītake udyāne dharmo deśitas tadā pañcasaptatyā śākyasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ satyāni dṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:411_24: yady evam idānīṃ kaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:411_25: [A_421b] te kathayanti; bhadrikaṃ śākyarājam iti; taiḥ saṃbhūya bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo rājyaiśvaryādhipatye abhiṣiktaḥ
V03vinv171u:414_0: atha rājā śuddhodanas tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kalyam evotthāya āsanakāni prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
V03vinv171u:414_1: samayo bhadanta; sajjaṃ bhaktam; yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti;
V03vinv171u:414_2: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṅghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:414_3: upasaṅkramya purastād bhikṣusaṅghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:414_4: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati,
V03vinv171u:414_5: saṃpravārayati; anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā bhagavate nyagrodhārāmaṃ niryātitavān;
V03vinv171u:414_6: bhagavatā ca pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā:
V03vinv171u:414_7: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tac chākyān upagacchatu /
V03vinv171u:414_8: prāpnuvantu padaṃ nityam īpsitān vā manorathān // iti;
V03vinv171u:414_12: bhagavān kapilavastuny avasthitaḥ ekaṃ divasaṃ rājakule bhuktaḥ,
V03vinv171u:417_0: rājñā śuddhodanena jaṭilā pravrajitāḥ bhikṣavo dṛṣṭāḥ;
V03vinv171u:417_1: śānteryāpathatvāc cittaprāsādikā no tu kāyaprāsādikāḥ kaṣṭais tapovrataviśeṣaiḥ karśitaśarīrāḥ;
V03vinv171u:417_3: kiṃ vāpīme jaṭilāḥ śānteryāpathatvāc cittaprāsādikāḥ no tu kāyaprāsādikāḥ;
V03vinv171u:417_5: saṃlakṣayati, śākyaparivāreṇaiti; tataḥ sarvaśākyān sannipātya kathayati;
V03vinv171u:417_6: bhavanto yadi sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat,
V03vinv171u:417_10: kasmān nānuyātrikā bhavatha; deva kiṃ pravrajāmaḥ? pravrajata;
V03vinv171u:417_11: kiṃ sarva eva? kulaikikayā; evaṃ kurmaḥ; rājñā śuddhodanena kapilavastunagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam;
V03vinv171u:417_12: rājā evaṃ samājñāpayati mama viṣayanivāsibhiḥ śākyaiḥ kulaikikayā pravrajitavyam iti
V03vinv171u:420_0: droṇodanasya dvau putrau aniruddho mahānāmā ca;
V03vinv171u:420_2: aniruddhas tu upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv171u:420_3: mahānāmā mātrā abhihitaḥ: putra rājñā ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ śākyaiḥ kulaikikayā pravrajitavyam iti;
V03vinv171u:420_4: sa tvaṃ pravraja; sa kathayati, nāhaṃ pravrajāmi; yas te priyaḥ putraḥ sukhāsīnas tiṣṭhati taṃ pravrājaya;
V03vinv171u:420_6: mā tena saha spardhāṃ kuru; amba tvaṃ tasyābhiprasannā yenāsau puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:420_9: putra evaṃ bhavatu; pratyakṣīkaromi; tayā riktapiṭharikābhi [ḥ] peṭakaṃ pūrayitvā śuklena vastreṇa ācchādya mudrālakṣitaṃ kṛtvā preṣyadārikāyā haste preṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:420_10: sandiṣṭā, yadi pṛcchet kim atreti, vaktavyaṃ na kiṃcid iti; sā tam ādāya saṃprasthitā; (SBV I 201) śakrasya devendrasya adhastāj jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate;
V03vinv171u:420_11: sa saṃlakṣayati: yena nāma upāriṣṭaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ;
V03vinv171u:420_15: yāvad asau dārikā tam ādāya aniruddhasya sakāśaṃ gatā;
V03vinv171u:420_16: tadā tenoktā dārikā, kim atreti; sā kathayati, kumāra na kiṃcid iti; aniruddhaḥ saṃlakṣayati: priyo 'haṃ mātuḥ; kim asau riktaṃ preṣayiṣyatīti;
V03vinv171u:420_17: nūnam atra nāma nakiṃcid bhojanaṃ prakṣiptam;
V03vinv171u:420_22: sandiṣṭaṃ ca amba pratidivasam īdṛśaṃ nakiṃcinnāma bhojanaṃ preṣayitum arhasīti;
V03vinv171u:420_24: tayā mahānāmno darśitam; putra dṛṣṭaṃ te? amba dṛṣṭam;
V03vinv171u:420_25: tan na tvaṃ mayā pūrvam evoktaḥ puṇyamaheśākhyas sa satvamanuṣyasubhagaḥ;
V03vinv171u:420_27: sa kathayati: amba puṇyamaheśākhyo vā bhavatu mā vā;
V03vinv171u:420_28: nāhaṃ pravrajāmīti; yataś ca mahānāmā sarvāvasthaṃ nādhivāsitavān pravrajyāṃ,
V03vinv171u:420_32: sa tvaṃ kiṃ pravrajasi, āhosvid gṛhe tiṣṭhasīti; sa kathayati: amba pravrajyāyāṃ ko 'nuśaṃasaḥ? ka ādīnavaḥ? gṛhāvāse ko 'nuśaṃsaḥ? ka ādīnavaḥ? putra pravrajyā saṃpadyamānā nirvāṇāvāhikā bhavati;
V03vinv171u:420_37: sa gṛhāvāse anuśaṃsaḥ; tasmād alaṃ gṛhāvāsena; anujānīhi; pravrajāmīti; sā kathayati: putra śobhanam, evaṃ kuru; aniruddhasya bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo vayasyakaḥ;
V03vinv171u:420_38: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ; tena khalu samayena bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo vīṇāṃ sārayati;
V03vinv171u:420_40: svaraḥ svarāntaraṃ gataḥ; aniruddho vīṇāyāṃ kṛtāvī; tena yathānusvaraṃ nimittam udgṛhītam;
V03vinv171u:420_41: sa dvāre sthitvā dauvārikaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:420_42: gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, bhadrikasya rājño nivedaya aniruddho dvāre tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti;
V03vinv171u:420_43: dauvārikeṇa (SBV I 202) gatvā bhadrikasya śākyarājasya niveditam:
V03vinv171u:420_44: deva aniruddho dvāre tiṣṭhati [A_422b] devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti;
V03vinv171u:420_45: sa kathayati: praviśatu bhavān aniruddhaḥ; ko bhavantam aniruddhaṃ vārayati;
V03vinv171u:420_46: sa praviṣṭaḥ; rājñā pariṣvajya niṣāditaḥ; uktaś ca kiyac ciraṃ tavāgatasyeti;
V03vinv171u:420_47: sa kathayati; yadā tava vīṇāṃ sārayatas tantrī chinnā;
V03vinv171u:420_48: svaro svarāntaraṃ gata iti; sa paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:420_49: vīṇāyāṃ bhavān kṛtāvī; bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:420_51: aniruddhaḥ kathayati: deva rājñā śuddhodanena ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam:
V03vinv171u:420_53: tad avalokito bhava; pravrajāmiti; rājā kathayati, yady evam aham api pravrajāmīti;
V03vinv171u:420_55: sa ihaiva vāsam] upagataḥ: śayyākarmāntikena śāyyāyāṃ jvaragandhikāni vastrāṇy ācchāditāni;
V03vinv171u:420_56: puṣpāṇi cāvakīrṇāni; aniruddhaḥ śayyāniṣaṇṇaḥ; tasya mallikāvṛntam adhastād avasthitam;
V03vinv171u:420_58: te pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ; mallikāvṛntaṃ [dṛṣṭvā] te paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv171u:420_62: sa kathayati: deva na sukhaṃ supta iti; rājñābhihitam, kimartham; aniruddhaḥ kathayati; deva jvaragandhāni vastrāṇi prajñaptāni;
V03vinv171u:420_63: puṣpāṇi cāvakīrṇāni; puṣpavṛntaiḥ kāyo drūyate; rājñā śayyākarmāntika āhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv171u:420_69: rājñā tantuvāya āhūyoktaḥ; kimarthaṃ tvayā jvaragandhikāni vastrāṇy anupradattāni? tantuvāyaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:420_71: tan mayā jvaritena utam; rājā kathayati: kumāra kathaṃ tvayā vijñātam;
V03vinv171u:420_72: sa kathayati, uṣṇasparśapratisaṃvedanāt; jvaragandhena ca; rājā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:420_75: yady ahaṃ pravrajāmi, devadattaḥ śākyānāṃ rājā bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:420_77: yannu vayaṃ sarve saṃbhūya devadattaṃ protsāhayāma iti
V03vinv171u:423_3: tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi; devadattaḥ saṃlakṣayati: yadi vakṣyāmi na pravrajāmīti bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo na pravrajiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:423_5: api nu mayā yam eva divasaṃ bhagavatā nyagrodhārāme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ tadaiva me buddhir utpannā,
V03vinv171u:423_8: iti viditvā kathayati: deva yūyaṃ pravrajatha; [A_422a] ahaṃ kimarthaṃ tiṣṭhāmīti;
V03vinv171u:423_10: mṛṣāvādiko 'yam; pratijñāyāṃ sthāpayitvā mahājanakāyaḥ pratisaṃviditaḥ kartavya iti;
V03vinv171u:423_11: tato rājñā tasya tad vacanaṃ patrābhilikhitaṃ kṛtvā kapilavastuni nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam:
V03vinv171u:423_16: yadi mayā vijñātam abhaviṣyat bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo niścayena pravrajed iti,
V03vinv171u:423_19: mṛṣāvādika iti kṛtvā rājyam api na lapsye;
V03vinv171u:426_3: candanavāripariṣiktam ucchritadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddhaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyam;
V03vinv171u:426_5: śākyastriyaḥ śākyakumāryāś ca kutūhalajātā gavākṣavātāyanavedikāsv avasthitāḥ,
V03vinv171u:426_6: śākyānām vibhūtiṃ draṣṭukāmaḥ (SBV I 204) nānādeśabhyāgataś ca janakāyaḥ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu;
V03vinv171u:426_7: naimittikā brāhamaṇā vipañcanakā āhūtāḥ śākyaparīkṣāṃ prati,
V03vinv171u:426_8: ko 'trārādhakaḥ ko na veti; atha śākyā mātāpitrāv avalokya hārakaṭakakeyūrādyalaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ pratyekapratyekaṃ ratheṣv abhiruhya nirgantum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:426_10: naimittikair dṛṣṭaḥ; te kathayanti: eṣa tāvad ārādhako bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv171u:426_13: tato devadatto nirgataḥ; tasya nirgacchataḥ śyenakena śakunakena cūḍāmaṇir apahṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:426_14: naimittikair dṛṣṭaḥ; te kathayanti: yādṛśam asya nimittaṃ niyatam ayaṃ śāstari prahṛtya narakaparāyaṇo bhavatīti;
V03vinv171u:426_17: ete 'pi mahāśrāvakeṣu vāgduścaritaṃ kṛtvā narakaparāyaṇā bhaviṣyanti iti;
V03vinv171u:426_18: upanandasya hastiskandhābhirūḍhasya itaś cāmutaś ca vyavalokayato muktāhāraḥ patitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:426_21: tatas teṣāṃ śākyānāṃ bhadrikāniruddhadevadattapramukhāni pañcaśākyaśatāni udyānayātrāpratispardhayā śobhayā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntāni;
V03vinv171u:426_22: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: saced ahaṃ śākyān ehibhikṣukayā pravrājayiṣyāmi kecid ārādhakā bhaviṣyanti,
V03vinv171u:426_23: kecid anārādhakāḥ; ye anārādhakās teṣāṃ bhaviṣyaty anyathātvam;
V03vinv171u:426_25: yanv ahaṃ sarvān eva bhikṣūn [A_422b] jñapticaturthena karmaṇā pravrājayeyam upasaṃpādayeyam;
V03vinv171u:426_29: evaṃ bhadanteti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ
V03vinv171u:429_0: śākyānām upālī nāma kalpakaḥ rājñā śuddodanena teṣāṃ pravrajatāṃ keśāvaropakaḥ preṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:429_1: bhadrikasya śākyarājasya keśān avatārayan so 'śrudurdinavadano bāṣpoparuddhyamānahṛdayo muhur (SBV I 205) niśvāsaparāyaṇaḥ keśān avatārayati;
V03vinv171u:429_3: upālin kimarthaṃ rodiṣi? sa karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣaraiḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:429_4: deva mayā jambūdvīpapradhānānāṃ puruṣāṇām upasthānaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv171u:429_6: kāmaṃ prāṇaviyogaḥ, na yuṣmābhiḥ parityaktasya jīvitam iti;
V03vinv171u:429_9: niyaccha śokam; ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā prākṛtapuruṣāṇām upasthānaṃ na kariṣyasi;
V03vinv171u:429_10: iti viditvā tenaikasmin pradeśe paṭakaḥ prasāritaḥ,
V03vinv171u:429_11: śākyakumārāś ca abhihitāḥ: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ kumārā eṣo 'smākam upālī kalpakaḥ kṛtopasthānaḥ;
V03vinv171u:429_12: tad asya jīvikānimittam alaṅkāraṃ paṭe sthāpayata;
V03vinv171u:429_14: tair hārārdhahārakaṭakakeyūrakuṇḍalānāṃ nānāratnapratyuptānām alaṅkāraviśeṣāṇāṃ paṭake mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:429_16: te snātuṃ gatāḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati: ime tāvat kumārāḥ kulavibhavayauvanopetāḥ sphītāny antaḥpurāṇi,
V03vinv171u:429_18: aham asminn alaṅkāramātre sakto 'nayena vyasanam āpatsye;
V03vinv171u:429_21: dharmatā hy eṣā yathā buddhā bhagavantas trī rātreḥ,
V03vinv171u:429_23: evaṃ mahāśrāvakā api; adrākṣīd āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ upālinaṃ kalpakam atīva saṃvignam;
V03vinv171u:429_24: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenopālī kalpakas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:429_26: kasmāt tvam upālin atīva saṃvignaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti;
V03vinv171u:429_27: sa kathayati: katham ahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra na cintāparo bhavāmi yatredānīm amī kumārāḥ kulavibhavayauvanopetāḥ sphītāny antaḥpurāṇi sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇy apāsya pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:429_28: aham asminn alaṅkāramātre sakto 'nayena vyasanam āpatsye? yady ahaṃ na nīcakulotpannaḥ syām aham api svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya udyujyeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:429_32: na gotrasārakaṃ, na śrutasārakam; api tu pratipattisārakam idaṃ munīndrapravacanam;
V03vinv171u:429_35: saced ākāṅkṣasi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣubhāvam,
V03vinv171u:432_0: athāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ upālinaṃ kalpakam ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:432_1: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:432_2: ayaṃ bhadanta upālī ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:432_3: tato bhagavān pravrājayatu, upasaṃpādayatu, anukampām upādāyeti; sa bhagavatā ābhāṣitaḥ ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv171u:432_5: saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ, pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ, saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśruḥ, varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣor īryāpathenāvasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:432_11: bhadrikena śākyarājena sāmīcīṃ kurvatā upālinaḥ pādau pratyabhijñātau,
V03vinv171u:432_12: tato mukhaṃ vyavalokitam; sa kathayati: bhagavann eṣa upālī; kim asyāpi mayā pādayor nipatitavyam iti;
V03vinv171u:432_15: nipateti; sa tasya pādayor nipatitaḥ; ṣaḍvikāraṃ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:432_16: iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī calati, saṃcalati, saṃpracalati; vyathate, pravyathate saṃpravyathate; pūrvā dig unnamati; paścimāvanamati; paścimā unnamati; purvā avanamati; dakṣiṇā unnamati; uttarā avanamati; uttarā unnamati; dakṣiṇā avanamati; (SBV I 207) madhya unnamati, anto 'vanamati; anta unnamati, madhyo 'vanamati; evam anupūrveṇa nipatitāḥ; devadatto na nipatati; bhagavān kathayati: vatsa mānaprahāṇāya pravrajyā,
V03vinv171u:432_17: nipateti; sa kathayati; tava kiṃ vidyate? nāham asya pādayor nipatāmīti;
V03vinv171u:432_18: sa na nipatatīti tatra devadattena bhagavatas tatprathamataḥ ājñā prativyūḍhā
V03vinv171u:432_19: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv171u:432_20: paśya bhadanta bhadrikena śākyarājena upālino vandanāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv171u:432_21: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi, yathātīte 'pi adhvany eṣā dharmatā;
V03vinv171u:432_22: yo 'sau pādayor nipatitaḥ; ṣaḍvikāraś ca pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:434_0: Sundara, the student, and Bhadrā, the harlot
V03vinv171u:435_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv171u:435_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:435_2: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ bhadrā nāma rūpājīvinī prativasati;
V03vinv171u:435_3: sundarāś ca nāmnā māṇavakaḥ; sa tasyāḥ sakāśam upasaṅkrāntaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:435_5: sā kathayati; santi te pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatānīti;
V03vinv171u:435_6: [A_423b] sa kathayati, na santi; gaccha, pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhītvā āgaccha;
V03vinv171u:435_7: tasya vibhavo nāsti; sa tasyām atyartham adhyavasitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_9: phalāni copanāmyati; tasyās tasminn anunaya utpannaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_10: yāvad apareṇa samayena vārāṇasyāṃ parvā pratyupasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_11: sarvās striyo vastramālyālaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ svakasvakeṣu krīḍāratiharṣabahulā avatiṣṭhante;
V03vinv171u:435_14: adya vārāṇaseyā manuṣyā vastrālaṅkāravibhūṣitā svakasvakābhiḥ strībhiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayiṣyanti;
V03vinv171u:435_16: sā caivaṃ cintayati; sundaraś ca māṇavakas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_21: tasyā rūpayauvanacāturyaguṇān vikalpayan madāviṣṭaḥ kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ jāgaritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_22: prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām atyarthamiddharparyākulīkṛtanayanas tāvat supto yāvad ādhityodaya iti;
V03vinv171u:435_23: sarvopayogāya lokena yadā sarvāṇi puṣpāṇy uccitāni tadā prativibuddhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_24: puṣpanimittam itaś (SBV I 208) cāmutaś ca paribhramati;
V03vinv171u:435_25: nārāgayati; śirīṣapuṣpāṇy ādāya tasyāḥ sakāśam upasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_30: iti viditvā kathayati: gaccha anyāni puṣpāṇy ādāyāgaccheti;
V03vinv171u:435_31: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya saṃyojanāny upacayaṃ gacchantīti sa pravṛddhakāmarāgo grīṣmaṇāṃ paścime māse vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake,
V03vinv171u:435_32: sthite madhyāhnasamaye, nagarād ativiprakṛṣṭadeśeṣv araṇyeṣu vaktrāparavaktraṃ gāyan puṣpāṇy uccinoti;
V03vinv171u:435_34: sa tīkṣṇārkaraśmisantāpitaḥ chāyāyāḥ śītalaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_36: ūrdhvaṃ tapati ādityaḥ adhastād dahati vālukā /
V03vinv171u:435_37: kasmād gāyasi gātrāṇi na te dahati ātapaḥ // iti;
V03vinv171u:435_39: na māṃ tāpayaty ādityaḥ saṅkalpās tāpayanti mām /
V03vinv171u:435_40: kāryākāryāṇi loke 'smiṃs tāpayanti tu nātapaḥ // iti;
V03vinv171u:435_41: rājā saṃlakṣayati: nūnam ayaṃ māṇavaḥ śaityakathāsu kṛtāvī yena sthite madhyāhnasamaye puṣpāṇy uccinotīti;
V03vinv171u:435_42: sa tenābhihitaḥ: kuru māṇava śaityāṃ tāvat kathām;
V03vinv171u:435_43: śṛṇomīti; sa saṃlakṣayati; nūnam asya rājñaḥ śarīradāhaḥ,
V03vinv171u:435_44: yenaivaṃ vadatīti; tena tasya vicitrā śaityakathā kṛtā,
V03vinv171u:435_46: rājā abhiprasannaḥ; amātyān pṛcchati; bhavanto yo rājño kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya jīvitam anuprayacchati,
V03vinv171u:435_48: tatas sa rājñā abhihitaḥ; māṇava adya rājakule vāsaṃ kalpayasva;
V03vinv171u:435_51: sa tasmin śayitaḥ bhadrām anusmṛtya cintayati;
V03vinv171u:435_52: tad upārdharājyaṃ gṛhṇāmi yatra bhadrā rūpājīvinī iti;
V03vinv171u:435_53: bhūyaḥ saṃlakṣayati: kīdṛśaḥ sa rājā yatra upārdharājyaṃ bhuṅkte;
V03vinv171u:435_54: yanv aham enam jīvitād vyaparopayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:435_55: punaḥ saṃlakṣayati: [A_424a] alam anena rājyena yad rājānaṃ praghātya iti;
V03vinv171u:435_56: aprāpte arthatarṣaḥ prāpte cārthe na tarṣavinivṛttiḥ /
V03vinv171u:435_57: aprāpte ca vighātas tasmād arthe matir anarthāya // iti
V03vinv171u:435_59: sa vipratisārajātaḥ śayanād avatīrya kṛṣṇājīnam āstīrya bhūmau śayitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_63: rājadūtā gatāḥ paśyanti; mahāśayanād avatīrya bhūmau śayitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_64: dṛṣṭvā ca punar aprasādaṃ pravedayanto rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:435_65: deva nāsāv arhati rājyam; rājā kathayati, kimartham? te kathayanti: deva yo hi nāma praṇītaṃ śayanāsanam apahāya bhūmau kṛṣṇājine śayitas tasya hīnādhimuktasya kiṃ rājyeneti;
V03vinv171u:435_66: rājā kathayati: bhavantaḥ sa prājñaḥ, kāraṇenātra bhavitavyam; śabdayata iti; tair asau śabditaḥ: rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ: bho māṇava kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāśayanāsanād kṛṣṇājine śayita iti;
V03vinv171u:435_68: tataḥ kathayati: deva anujānīhi pravrajāmīti; rājā kathayati: samayato 'nujānāmi; yadi pravrajitvā kiñcid guṇagaṇam adhigacchasi mamārocayitavyam iti;
V03vinv171u:435_70: tatas tena śāntaṃ pradeśaṃ gatvā anācāryakeṇa anupādhyāyakena pratyekabodhir anugatā;
V03vinv171u:435_73: gacchāmi tāṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayāmi iti;
V03vinv171u:435_74: sa rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:435_75: rājā tasya pādayor nipatya gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:438_2: uktaś ca: gaṅgāpāla bhūyo bhūyaḥ mām etāṃ gāthāṃ smārayiṣyasīti;
V03vinv171u:438_4: sa yadā rājño brahmadattasya śmaśrukarma karoti tadāsau middham avakrāmati;
V03vinv171u:438_5: ricchatayā prabodhyate; prabuddhaś (SBV I 210) ca gaṅgāpālaṃ vareṇa pravārayati,
V03vinv171u:438_7: sa kathayati, deva vijñāpayiṣyāmīti; yadā gaṅgāpālo rājānaṃ gāthāṃ smārayati tadā rājñaḥ kāmakathāyām api cittaṃ na krāmati;
V03vinv171u:438_8: prāg eva kāmādhyācaraṇe; so 'ntaḥpuraṃ an vyavalokayati;
V03vinv171u:438_10: mātula yadā te devo vareṇa pravārayati,
V03vinv171u:438_11: tadā vaktavyam, yadi me devo 'bhiprasannaḥ tad asyā gāthāyā arthaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayed iti;
V03vinv171u:438_12: rājñā tasyā gāthāyā artho vistareṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ;
V03vinv171u:438_14: deva kṛtopasthāno 'ham; pravrajāmy agārād anagārikām iti;
V03vinv171u:438_15: rājā kathayati: yadi pravrājitaḥ kiñcid guṇagaṇam adhigamiṣyasi mama nivedayiṣyasīti;
V03vinv171u:438_16: sa kathayati: deva evaṃ bhavatu nivedayiṣyāmīti;
V03vinv171u:438_19: tasyaitad abhavat: mayā rājño brahmadattasya pratijñātam;
V03vinv171u:438_21: sa yena rājā brahmadattas tena upasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:438_22: upasaṅkramya upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:438_26: rājā brahmadattaḥ gaṅgāpālasya ṛṣeḥ [pādayor nipatati] ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:438_28: pravibhajya hi yatraiṣa prāvrajat kṣurabhāṇḍikam // iti;
V03vinv171u:438_29: rājā brahmadatto mātaram anusaṃjñapayan gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:438_37: tapasā bhāti na vācya eṣa kiñcit // iti; (SBV I 211)
V03vinv171u:438_38: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena brahmadatto nāma rājābhūd eṣa eva sa bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ;
V03vinv171u:438_39: yo 'sau gaṅgapālanāmā ṛṣir eṣa evāsāv upālī;
V03vinv171u:438_40: tadāpi bhadrikena śākyarājena brahmadattabhūtena upālino gaṅgapālaṛṣibhūtasya praṇāme kṛte ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:438_41: etarhy api bhadrikena śākyarājena upālinaḥ pravrajitasya praṇāme kṛte ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jāta iti.
V03vinv171u:444_0: atha bhagavān nandāṃ ca nandabalāṃ ca grāmikaduhitarau dhārmyayā kathayā sandarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv171u:446_0: Marvellous deeds of the Buddha before Urubilvā Kāśyapa
V03vinv171u:447_0: a) The Buddha subdues a nāga
V03vinv171u:448_1: astīha magadheṣu janapadeṣu kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā suśīlaḥ saṃmato yam aham anvāvartayeyaṃ yasmin me 'nvāvṛtte 'lpakṛcchreṇa mahājanakāyo 'nvāvartiṣyate;
V03vinv171u:448_2: tena khalu samayenorubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallako;
V03vinv171u:448_3: sa viṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā māgadhakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānito pūjito 'rhan saṃmataḥ;
V03vinv171u:448_4: paṃcaśataparivāro nadyā nairaṃjanāyās tīra āśramapade śāmyate;
V03vinv171u:448_5: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: ayam urubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo jīrṇo mahallakaḥ pūrvavad yāvac chāmyate;
V03vinv171u:448_6: yanv aham urubilvākāśyapaṃ jaṭilam anvāvartayeyaṃ yasmin me 'nvāvṛtte 'lpakṛcchreṇa mahājanakāyo 'nvāvartiṣyate [CPS_24a.
V03vinv171u:448_8: adrākṣīd urubilvlākāśyapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:448_9: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavato 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:448_14: athorubilvākāśyapo bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte nyaṣīdat;
V03vinv171u:448_15: (SBV I 218) ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapaṃ jaṭilam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:448_16: yadi te kāśyapa agurv ahaṃ tavāgnyāgāra ekarātrīṃ vihareyaṃ;
V03vinv171u:448_17: na me mahāśramaṇa aguru; api tu tatrāśīviṣo nāgaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv171u:448_18: mā te sa viheṭhayiṣyati; aṅga tvaṃ kāśyapa anujānīhi na me sa viheṭayiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:448_19: sacen mahāśramaṇa na te viheṭhayati tatra mahāśramaṇa vihara yathāsukham eva;
V03vinv171u:448_20: [CPS_24a.9] atha bhagavān bahir agnyāgārasya pādau prakṣālya agnyāgāraṃ parviśya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtim upasthāpya;
V03vinv171u:448_21: adrākṣīd āśīviṣo nāgo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:448_26: athāśīviṣasya nāgasya krodhānubhāvena bhagavataś ca ṛddhyānubhāvena sarvo 'gnyāgāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvalībhūto dhyāyati;
V03vinv171u:448_27: adrākṣīd urubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye nakṣatrāṇi vyavalokayamānaḥ sarvam agnyāgāram ādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ saṃprajvalitam ekajvalībhūtaṃ dhyāyantaṃ;

V03vinv171u:504_0: The Buddha in Magadha. The invitation of Bimbisāra
V03vinv171u:505_0: [CPS_27b.1] aśrauṣū rajño māgadhasya śraiṇyasya bimbisārasya pauruṣeyā janapadān anvāhiṇḍantaḥ:
V03vinv171u:505_1: śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'nuhimavatpārśve nadyā bhāgirathyās tīre kapilasyarṣer āśramapadasya nātidūre;
V03vinv171u:505_2: sa brāhmaṇair nimittikair vipaṃcanakair vyākṛtaḥ pūrvavad yāvad vighuṣṭaśabdo loke;
V03vinv171u:505_3: sa keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:505_4: so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho gayāyāṃ viharati gayāśīrṣe caitye sārdhaṃ bhikṣusahasreṇa sarvaiḥ purāṇajaṭilaiḥ sarvaiś cārhadbhiḥ (SBV I 233) kṣīṇāsravaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair avahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñayā suvimuktacittaiḥ;
V03vinv171u:505_5: śrutvā ca punar yena rājā māgadhaḥ śraiṇyo bimbisāras tenopajagmuḥ;
V03vinv171u:505_6: upetya rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śraiṇyaṃ bimbisāram idam avocan:
V03vinv171u:505_7: yat khalu jānīyāḥ; iha vayaṃ aśrauṣma devasya janapadān anvāhiṇḍantaḥ:
V03vinv171u:505_8: yaḥ śākyānāṃ kumāra utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad vighuṣṭaśabdo loke;
V03vinv171u:505_9: sa keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:505_10: so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho gayāyāṃ gayāśīrṣe caitye eva viharati sārdhaṃ bhikṣusahasreṇa sarvaiḥ purāṇajaṭilaiḥ sarvaiś cārhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ pūrvavad yāvad samyagājñayā suvimuktacittaiḥ;
V03vinv171u:505_11: tan devaḥ paryupāsīta; evaṃ devaḥ ### bhaviṣyati; atha rājā māgadhaḥ śraiṇyo biṃbisāro 'nyatamaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:505_12: ehi bhoḥ puruṣa yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrama;
V03vinv171u:505_13: upetyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva;
V03vinv171u:505_14: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchālpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:505_15: evaṃ ca vada; āgacchatu bhagavān rājagṛham;
V03vinv171u:505_16: ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāvajjīvam upasthāsyāmi cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv171u:505_17: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājño māgadhasya śraiṇyasya biṃbisārasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma;
V03vinv171u:505_19: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ sa puruṣo bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:505_20: rājā bhadanta māgadhaḥ śraiṇyo biṃbisāro bhagavatpādau śirasā vandaty alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ ca pūrvavad yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:505_21: sukhī bhavatu puruṣa rājā māgadhaḥ śraiṇyo biṃbisāras tvaṃ ca
V03vinv171u:507_0: The visit of Biṃbisāra. Urubilvākāśyapa and the Buddha
V03vinv171u:508_0: [CPS_27b.14] rājā bhadanta māgadhaḥ śraiṇyo biṃbisāra evaṃ vadati:
V03vinv171u:508_2: ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāvajjīvam upasthāsyāmi cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv171u:508_4: atha so puruṣo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:508_5: [CPS_27c.1] atha bhagavān mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusahasreṇa sarvaiḥ (SBV I 234) purāṇajaṭilaiḥ sarvaiś cārhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair avahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñayā suvimuktacittair māgadheṣu janapadeṣu caryāṃ caran yena yaṣṭivanaṃ supratiṣṭhito māgadhakānāṃ caityas tena caryāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:508_6: atha bhagavān supratiṣṭhitaṃ caityaṃ anuprāpto yaṣṭivane supratiṣṭhite viharati māgadhakānāṃ caitye;
V03vinv171u:508_8: bhagavān mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusahasreṇa sarvaiḥ pūrvavad yāvat samyagājñayā suvimuktacittair māgadheṣu janapadeṣu caryāṃ caran yena yaṣṭivanaṃ supratiṣṭhito māgadhakānāṃ caityas tenānuprāpto yaṣṭivane viharati māgadhakānāṃ caitye
